trans-unit.source: Note: Browsers that support the two value syntax, on finding the inner value only, such as when display: flex or display: grid is specified, will set their outer value to block. This will result in expected behavior; for example if you specify an element to be display: grid, you would expect that the box created on the grid container would be a block level box.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在查找内部值时（例如，当指定 display: flex 或 display: grid 时），支持两种值语法的浏览器会将其外部值设置为 block 。这将导致预期的行为；例如，如果您指定要 display: grid 的元素：grid，则您希望在网格容器上创建的框将是块级框。

trans-unit.source: Note: Browsers that support the two value syntax, on finding the outer value only, such as when display: block or display: inline is specified, will set the inner value to flow. This will result in expected behavior; for example if you specify an element to be block, you would expect that the children of that element would participate in block and inline normal flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在查找外部值时（例如，当指定 display: block 或 display: inline 时），支持两个值语法的浏览器会将内部值设置为 flow 。这将导致预期的行为；例如，如果您指定一个要阻止的元素，则您希望该元素的子元素参与阻止和内联常规流布局。

trans-unit.source: Note: CSS versions 1 and 2 were a single monolithic specification where all of CSS was defined in one large document. As CSS became a more feature rich language, maintaining one huge specification became problematic, with different parts of CSS moving on at different speeds. CSS was therefore modularised, and the various CSS Specifications are different modules that make up CSS today. These modules relate to each other, and are at different stages of development.
trans-unit.target: 注意：CSS版本1和2是单个整体规范，其中所有CSS都在一个大型文档中定义。随着CSS成为一种功能更丰富的语言，维护一个庞大的规范变得有问题，CSS的不同部分以不同的速度前进。因此，CSS已被模块化，并且各种CSS规范是当今组成CSS的不同模块。这些模块相互关联，并且处于不同的开发阶段。

trans-unit.source: Note: Developers tend to use :-moz-focusring to differentiate between the focus state when the user focuses an element via a mouse click versus keyboard tabbing. It is also potentially useful if you are creating a custom element and you want to change its style based on its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 注意：开发人员倾向于使用 :-moz-focusring 来区分用户通过鼠标单击或键盘标签聚焦元素时的 focus 状态。如果要创建自定义元素，并且想根据其行为来更改其样式，它也可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Early versions of the spec called this property motion-path. It was changed to offset-path because the property describe static positions, not motion.
trans-unit.target: 注意：规范的早期版本称为此属性 motion-path 。由于该属性描述的是静态位置而非运动，因此将其更改为 offset-path 。

trans-unit.source: Note: For some years Firefox had a bug whereby it would attempt to follow the visual order and not the source order, making it behave differently to other browsers. This has now been fixed. You should always take the source order as the logical order of the document as all up-to-date user agents will be following the specification and doing so.
trans-unit.target: 注意：几年来，Firefox出现了一个错误，即它会尝试遵循视​​觉顺序而不是源顺序，从而使其行为与其他浏览器不同。现在，此问题已得到解决。您应始终将源顺序作为文档的逻辑顺序，因为所有最新的用户代理都将遵循该规范并遵循该规范。

trans-unit.source: Note: In browsers that support the two-value syntax, if no inner value is specified it will default to flow. If no outer value is specified, the principal box will have an outer display type of block.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在支持二值语法的浏览器中，如果未指定内部值，则默认为 flow 。如果未指定外部值，则主体框的外部显示类型为 block 。

trans-unit.source: Note: In the case of this property, markers are only appropriate when drawing SVG shapes involving the use of the marker-* properties (e.g. marker-start) and <marker> element. They do not apply to HTML text, so in that case, you can only determine the order of stroke and fill.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于此属性，仅当绘制涉及使用 marker-* 属性（例如 marker-start ）和 <marker> 元素的SVG形状时，才适合使用标记。它们不适用于HTML文本，因此在这种情况下，您只能确定 stroke 和 fill 的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Note: Multi-column Layout predates the Box Alignment specification. and the properties listed here, while specified for Multicol, may not be supported in browsers.
trans-unit.target: 注意：“多列布局”早于“框对齐”规范。并且为Multicol指定了此处列出的属性，但浏览器可能不支持。

trans-unit.source: Note: Not all browsers have implemented the full syntax for font format, so test carefully. All browsers that support variable fonts will still render them if you set the format to just the file format, rather than format-variations (i.e. woff2 instead of woff2-variations), but it’s best to use the proper syntax if possible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并非所有浏览器都实现了字体格式的完整语法，因此请仔细测试。如果将格式设置为仅文件格式而不是格式变体（即 woff2 而不是 woff2-variations ），则所有支持可变字体的浏览器仍将呈现它们，但是，如果可能的话，最好使用适当的语法。

trans-unit.source: Note: Prior to Firefox 63 this property was implemented as offset-block-end. Firefox 63 updated the name of this property to match a change to the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 63之前，此属性已实现为offset-block-end。Firefox 63更新了此属性的名称，以匹配对规范的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: Prior to Firefox 63 this property was implemented as offset-block-start. Firefox 63 updated the name of this property to match a change to the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 63之前，此属性已实现为offset-block-start。Firefox 63更新了此属性的名称，以匹配对规范的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: Prior to Firefox 63 this property was implemented as offset-inline-end. Firefox 63 updated the name of this property to match a change to the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 63之前，此属性已实现为offset-inline-end。Firefox 63更新了此属性的名称，以匹配对规范的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: Prior to Firefox 63 this property was implemented as offset-inline-start. Firefox 63 updated the name of this property to match a change to the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox 63之前，此属性已实现为offset-inline-start。Firefox 63更新了此属性的名称，以匹配对规范的更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: Registered axis tags are identified using lower-case tags, whereas custom axes should be given upper-case tags. Note that font designers aren't forced follow this practice in any way, and some won't. The important takeaway here is that axis tags are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 注意：已注册的轴标签使用小写标签标识，而自定义轴应使用大写标签。请注意，字体设计师不会以任何方式被强制遵循，有些则不会。这里重要的一点是，轴标签区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Note: See overscroll-behavior for a full explanation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：有关完整说明，请参见 overscroll-behavior 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Since Firefox 58, this media feature is no longer available to web content — it is only available internally (e.g. to XUL / chrome code). See bug 1396066 for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Firefox 58开始，此媒体功能不再可用于Web内容—仅在内部可用（例如，对XUL / chrome代码）。有关更多详细信息，请参见错误1396066。

trans-unit.source: Note: Subgrids are not yet implemented in any browsers, and the specification is subject to change.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尚未在任何浏览器中实现子网格，并且该规范可能会更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: Supplying value ranges for font-weight, font-stretch, and font-style will keep the browser from attempting to render an axis outside that range if you are using the appropriate attribute (i.e. font-weight or font-stretch), but will not block you from supplying an invalid value via font-variation-settings, so use with care.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果使用适当的属性（即 font-weight 或 font-stretch ），则为 font-weight ， font-stretch 和 font-style 提供值范围将使浏览器无法尝试渲染超出该范围的轴，但是不会阻止您通过 font-variation-settings 提供无效的值，因此请谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The % symbol is not used when utilizing font-variation-settings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 font-variation-settings 时不使用％符号。

trans-unit.source: Note: The :hover pseudo-class is problematic on touchscreens. Depending on the browser, the :hover pseudo-class might never match, match only for a moment after touching an element, or continue to match even after the user has stopped touching and until the user touches another element. Web developers should make sure that content is accessible on devices with limited or non-existent hovering capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 注意：： :hover 伪类在触摸屏上有问题。取决于浏览器， :hover 伪类可能永远不匹配，仅在触摸一个元素之后匹配一次，或者甚至在用户停止触摸之后甚至在用户触摸另一个元素之前仍继续匹配。Web开发人员应确保在具有有限悬停功能或不存在悬停功能的设备上可以访问内容。

trans-unit.source: Note: The deg keyword is not used when utilizing font-variation-settings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 font-variation-settings 时不使用 deg 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Note: The text-emphasis-position cannot be set, and therefore are not reset either, using the text-emphasis shorthand property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：无法使用 text-emphasis 速记属性设置 text-emphasis-position ，因此也无法重置。

trans-unit.source: Note: The transitionend event doesn't fire if the transition is aborted before the transition is completed because either the element is made display: none or the animating property's value is changed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在过渡完成之前中止过渡，则不会触发 transitionend 事件，因为该元素将 display : none 或动画属性的值被更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: The CSS Working Group are currently trying to decide what to do about the four-value shorthands for logical properties, for example the equivalents to setting four physical properties at once, like margins with the margin property. We would need some kind of modifier if we were to reuse margin for flow-relative properties. If you would like to read the suggestions or comment on them the relevant GitHub issue is #1282.
trans-unit.target: 注意：CSS工作组当前正在尝试决定如何处理逻辑属性的四值简写，例如，等效于一次设置四个物理属性，例如使用 margin 属性设置margin。如果要为流量相对属性重用 margin ，则需要某种修饰符。如果您想阅读建议或对其进行评论，则相关的GitHub问题是＃1282。

trans-unit.source: Note: The JavaScript Element.scrollTop property may be used to scroll an HTML element even when overflow is set to hidden.
trans-unit.target: 注意：即使将 overflow 设置为 hidden ，JavaScript Element.scrollTop 属性也可用于滚动HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: The alignment properties in Flexbox have been placed into their own specification — CSS Box Alignment Level 3. It is expected that this spec will ultimately supersede the properties as defined in Flexbox Level One.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Flexbox中的对齐属性已放入其自己的规范中-CSS Box Alignment Level 3。预期该规范最终将取代Flexbox Level One中定义的属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The browsers that have implemented the Logical Properties specification have so far implemented the direct mappings and not the new shorthands. Look to the browser compatibility data section on each property page reference for more details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：到目前为止，已实现“逻辑属性”规范的浏览器已实现了直接映射，而不是新的缩写。有关更多详细信息，请参见每个属性页参考上的浏览器兼容性数据部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: The documentation for each layout method will detail how Box Alignment is applied there.
trans-unit.target: 注意：每种布局方法的文档都将详细说明如何在其中应用“框对齐”。

trans-unit.target: 注意：以下示例显示了属性和一些示例组合，以及较低级别的语法等效项。由于浏览器实现的不一致，它们可能不完全匹配，但是在许多情况下，第一个示例将与第二个示例匹配。所显示的字体是Playfair Display，Source Serif Pro，IBM Plex Serif，Dancing Script和Kokoro（全部可用且免费使用，大多数都在Google字体和其他服务上）。

trans-unit.source: Note: The syntax of the fallback, like that of custom properties, allows commas. For example, var(--foo, red, blue) defines a fallback of red, blue — anything between the first comma and the end of the function is considered a fallback value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：后备的语法与自定义属性的语法一样，允许使用逗号。例如， var(--foo, red, blue) 限定的回退 red, blue -第一个逗号和功能的被认为是一个回退值的端部之间任何东西。

The min and max prefixes as implemented by Gecko are named min--moz-device-pixel-ratio and max--moz-device-pixel-ratio; but the same prefixes as implemented by Webkit are named -webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio and -webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio.

trans-unit.source: Note: This property is a low-level mechanism designed to set variable font features where no other way to enable or access those features exist. You should only use it when no basic properties exist to set those features (e.g. font-weight, font-style).

'lining' figures on the other hand sit more uniformly on their own or in front of capitalized words.

trans-unit.source: Variable fonts are an evolution of the OpenType font specification that enables many different variations of a typeface to be incorporated into a single file, rather than having a separate font file for every width, weight, or style. They let you access all the variations contained in a given font file via CSS and a single @font-face reference. This article will give you all you need to know to get you started using variable fonts.
trans-unit.target: 可变字体是OpenType字体规范的发展，它允许将许多不同的字体变体合并到单个文件中，而不是针对每种宽度，粗细或样式都具有单独的字体文件。它们使您可以通过CSS和单个 @font-face 引用访问给定字体文件中包含的所有变体。本文将为您提供开始使用可变字体所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.source: Variable fonts are an evolution of the OpenType font specification that enables many different variations of a typeface to be incorporated into a single file, rather than having a separate font file for every width, weight, or style. This article will give you all you need to know to get you started using variable fonts.
trans-unit.target: 可变字体是OpenType字体规范的发展，它允许将许多不同的字体变体合并到单个文件中，而不是针对每种宽度，粗细或样式都具有单独的字体文件。本文将为您提供开始使用可变字体所需的全部知识。

trans-unit.source: Warning: In order to use variable fonts on your operating system, you need to make sure that it is up to date. For example Linux OSes need the latest Linux Freetype version, and macOS prior to 10.13 does not support variable fonts. If your operating system is not up to date, you will not be able to use variable fonts in web pages or the Firefox Developer Tools.
trans-unit.target: 警告：为了在操作系统上使用可变字体，您需要确保它是最新的。例如，Linux操作系统需要最新的Linux Freetype版本，而10.13之前的macOS不支持可变字体。如果您的操作系统不是最新的，则将无法在网页或Firefox开发人员工具中使用可变字体。

trans-unit.source: Warning: Use of display: contents will also remove the element from the accessibility tree – screen readers will not see what's inside, just the same as if you used display: none. Use of contents should only be for presentational, not content, elements.

trans-unit.source: A <number> representing the abscissa of the scaling vector.

trans-unit.source: A <number> representing the ordinate of the scaling vector. If not defined, its default value is sx, resulting in a uniform scaling that preserves the element's aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 表示所述缩放向量的纵坐标。如果未定义，则其默认值为 sx ，从而导致均匀缩放，从而保留元素的长宽比。

trans-unit.source: A <border-radius> value in inset() is computed as an expanded list of all eight <length> or percentage values.
trans-unit.target: inset() 中的 <border-radius> 值被计算为所有八个 <length> 或百分比值的扩展列表。

trans-unit.source: A <color value>.

trans-unit.target: 甲 font-stretch 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如 font-stretch: 50% 200%;

trans-unit.source: A font-style value. Since Firefox 61 (and in other modern browsers) this also accepts two values to specify a range that is supported by a font-face, for example font-style: oblique 20deg 50deg;
trans-unit.target: 一 font-style 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如， font-style: oblique 20deg 50deg;

trans-unit.source: A font-variant value.
trans-unit.target: 甲 font-variant 值。

trans-unit.source: A font-weight value. Since Firefox 61 (and in other modern browsers) this also accepts two values to specify a range that is supported by a font-face, for example font-weight: 100 400;
trans-unit.target: 甲 font-weight 值。由于Firefox 61（和其他现代浏览器），它也接受两个值来指定字体支持的范围，例如 font-weight: 100 400;

trans-unit.source: A <gradient> data type
trans-unit.target: 甲 <gradient> 数据类型

trans-unit.source: A CSSpseudo-class is a keyword added to a selector that specifies a special state of the selected element(s). For example, :hover can be used to change a button's color when the user's pointer hovers over it.
trans-unit.target: 甲CSS 伪类是添加到选择一个关键字，它指定所选择的元件（一个或多个）的一个特殊状态。例如，当用户的指针悬停在按钮上时， :hover 可用于更改按钮的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A CSSlayout mode, sometimes simply called layout, is an algorithm that determines the position and size of boxes based on the way they interact with their sibling and ancestor boxes. There are several of them:
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS 布局模式，有时简称布局，是一个算法来决定的箱基础上，路的位置和大小，他们相互作用与他们的兄弟姐妹和祖先盒。其中有几个：

trans-unit.source: A description of which properties are animatable is available; it's worth noting that this description is also valid for CSS transitions.
trans-unit.target: 有哪些属性可以设置动画的描述。值得注意的是，此描述对于CSS Transitions也有效。

trans-unit.source: A <length> giving the distance from the user to the z=0 plane. It is used to apply a perspective transform to the element and its content. If the value is 0 or a negative number, no perspective transform is applied.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 从用户到z = 0的平面中给出的距离。它用于对元素及其内容应用透视变换。如果值为 0 或负数，则不应用透视变换。

trans-unit.source: A <length> or <percentage>. If the other value is left or right, then this value defines Y, relative to the top edge. If the other value is top or bottom, then this value defines X, relative to the left edge. If both values are <length> or <percentage> values, then the first defines X and the second Y.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 或 <percentage> 。如果另一个值是 left 或 right ，则此值相对于上边缘定义Y。如果另一个值为 top 或 bottom ，则此值定义相对于左边缘的X。如果两个值都是 <length> 或 <percentage> 值，则第一个定义X，第二个定义Y。

trans-unit.source: A <length> or <percentage>. This specifies the X coordinate relative to the left edge, with the Y coordinate set to 50%.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 或 <percentage> 。这将指定相对于左边缘的X坐标，并将Y坐标设置为50％。

trans-unit.source: A <number> in the range 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive, representing the opacity of the channel (that is, the value of its alpha channel). Any value outside the interval, though valid, is clamped to the nearest limit in the range.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 在范围 0.0 到 1.0 （含），表示信道的不透明度（即，它的α通道的值）。间隔之外的任何值（尽管有效）都被钳位到该范围内的最接近极限。

trans-unit.source: A <number> specifying a scale factor to make the affected element scale by the same factor along both the X and Y axes. Equivalent to a scale() (2D scaling) function with a single value specified.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 指定的比例因子由沿X轴和Y轴都相同的因子，使受影响的元素比例。与指定单个值的 scale() （2D缩放）函数等效。

trans-unit.source: A <number> value between 1 and 1000, inclusive. Higher numbers represent weights that are bolder than (or as bold as) lower numbers. Certain commonly used values correspond to common weight names, as described in the Common weight name mapping section below.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <number> 1到1000之间的值，包括端值。较高的数字表示的权重要比较低的数字大（或大胆）。某些常用值对应于通用权重名称，如下面“ 通用权重名称映射”部分所述。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage> of the containing block's height.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <percentage> 包含块的高度的。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage> of the containing block's width.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <percentage> 包含块的宽度的。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage> value scales the mask image in the corresponding dimension to the specified percentage of the mask positioning area, which is determined by the value of mask-origin. The mask positioning area is, by default, the area containing the content of the box and its padding; the area may also be changed to just the content or to the area containing borders, padding and content. Negative percentages are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <percentage> 值缩放在相应的尺寸与掩模定位区域，这是由的值确定的指定百分比掩模图像 mask-origin 。默认情况下，遮罩定位区域是包含框内容及其填充的区域；该区域也可以更改为仅内容或包含边框，填充和内容的区域。不允许使用负百分比。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage> value. Negative values are not allowed for this property.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <percentage> 值。此属性不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: A <percentage>; see border-radius for details.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <percentage> ; 有关详细信息，请参见 border-radius 。

trans-unit.source: A <position> value in circle() or ellipse() is computed as a pair of offsets (horizontal then vertical) from the top left origin, each given as a combination of an absolute length and a percentage.
trans-unit.target: circle() 或 ellipse() 中的 <position> 值计算为从左上角原点开始的一对偏移量（水平然后垂直），每个偏移量都是绝对长度和百分比的组合。

trans-unit.source: A <position>. A position defines an x/y coordinate, to place an item relative to the edges of an element's box. It can be defined using one or two values. If two values are used, the first value represents the horizontal position and the second represents the vertical position. If only one value is specified, the second value is assumed to be center.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <position> 。一个位置定义一个x / y坐标，以相对于元素框的边缘放置一个项目。可以使用一个或两个值来定义。如果使用两个值，则第一个值代表水平位置，第二个值代表垂直位置。如果仅指定一个值，则假定第二个值为 center 。

trans-unit.source: A <string> representing the language you want to target. Acceptable values are specified in the HTML spec.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <string> 表示要定位的语言。可接受的值在HTML规范中指定。

trans-unit.source: A transform or perspectivevalue other than none

trans-unit.source: A <custom-ident> must not be placed between single or double quotes as this would be identical to a <string>. Moreover, the first character must not be a decimal digit, nor a hyphen (-) followed by a decimal digit or another hyphen.
trans-unit.target: 不能将 <custom-ident> 放在单引号或双引号之间，因为这将与 <string> 相同。此外，第一个字符不能为十进制数字，也不能为连字符（ - ）后接十进制数字或另一个连字符。

trans-unit.source: A <custom-ident> naming the counter, followed optionally by an <integer>. You may specify as many counters to increment as you want, with each name or name-number pair separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <custom-ident> 命名计数器，由任选地随后 <integer> 。您可以指定任意数量的计数器来递增，每个名称或名称-数字对之间用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: A <custom-ident> naming the counter, followed optionally by an <integer>. You may specify as many counters to reset as you want, with each name or name-number pair separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <custom-ident> 命名计数器，由任选地随后 <integer> 。您可以指定任意数量的计数器进行重置，每个名称或名称-数字对之间用空格分隔。

trans-unit.source: A <length> value scales the mask image to the specified length in the corresponding dimension. Negative lengths are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 <length> 值缩放掩模图像到在相应的尺寸的指定的长度。不允许负长度。

trans-unit.source: A url(…) or a comma separated list url(…), url(…), …, pointing to an image file. More than one <url> may be provided as fallbacks, in case some cursor image types are not supported. A non-URL fallback (one or more of the keyword values) must be at the end of the fallback list. See Using URL values for the cursor property for more details.
trans-unit.target: 指向图像文件的 url(…) 或以逗号分隔的列表 url(…), url(…), … 在不支持某些光标图像类型的情况下，可以提供多个 <url> 作为后备。非URL后备（一个或多个关键字值）必须位于后备列表的末尾。有关更多详细信息，请参见使用cursor属性的URL值。

trans-unit.source: A floating element is one where the computed value of float is not none.
trans-unit.target: 甲浮动元件是其中的计算值 float 不是 none 。

trans-unit.source: A grid cell is the smallest unit on a grid. Conceptually it is like a table cell. As we saw in our earlier examples, once a grid is defined as a parent the child items will lay themselves out in one cell each of the defined grid. In the below image, I have highlighted the first cell of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 甲网格单元是在网格上的最小单位。从概念上讲，它就像一个表格单元格。正如我们在前面的示例中看到的那样，一旦将网格定义为父网格，则子项将自己放置在每个已定义网格的一个单元格中。在下图中，我突出显示了网格的第一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: A quantity query styles elements depending on how many of them there are. In this example, list items turn red when there are at least three of them in a given list. This is accomplished by combining the capabilities of the nth-last-child pseudo-class and the general sibling combinator.
trans-unit.target: 数量查询的样式取决于元素的数量。在此示例中，当给定列表中至少有三个列表项时，它们会变为红色。这是通过结合 nth-last-child 伪类和通用同级组合器的功能来实现的。

trans-unit.source: A zoom factor of 1.0 or 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values are zoomed in. Smaller values are zoomed out.
trans-unit.target: 甲缩放因子的 1.0 或 100% 对应于未缩放。较大的值被放大。较小的值被缩小。

trans-unit.source: A zoom factor of 1.0 or 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values zoom in. Smaller values zoom out.
trans-unit.target: 甲缩放因子的 1.0 或 100% 对应于未缩放。较大的值将放大。较小的值将缩小。

trans-unit.source: A positioned element is an element whose computedposition value is either relative, absolute, fixed, or sticky. (In other words, it's anything except static.)
trans-unit.target: 甲定位元件是一个元件，其计算 position 值是 relative ， absolute ， fixed ，或 sticky 。（换句话说，除了 static 之外，什么都没有。）

trans-unit.source: A relatively positioned element is an element whose computedposition value is relative. The top and bottom properties specify the vertical offset from its normal position; the left and right properties specify the horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: 甲相对定位元件是一个元件，其计算 position 值是 relative 。的 top 和 bottom 属性指定垂直从其正常位置偏移; 在 left 和 right 属性指定水平偏移。

trans-unit.source: A statement is a building block that begins with any non-space characters and ends at the first closing brace or semi-colon (outside a string, non-escaped and not included into another {}, () or [] pair).
trans-unit.target: 甲语句是一个构建块，与在第一闭合支架或分号任何非空格字符和结束开始（字符串外，非转义和不包括到另一个{}，（）或[]对）。

trans-unit.source: A stickily positioned element is an element whose computedposition value is sticky. It's treated as relatively positioned until its containing block crosses a specified threshold (such as setting top to value other than auto) within its flow root (or the container it scrolls within), at which point it is treated as "stuck" until meeting the opposite edge of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 甲粘粘定位元件是一个元件，其计算 position 值是 sticky 。它被视为相对定位，直到其包含的块在流根（或其滚动到的容器）内超过指定的阈值（例如，将 top 设置为auto以外的值），在此点将其视为“卡住”，直到达到其包含块的相对边缘。

trans-unit.source: A CSS comment is used to add explanatory notes to the code or to prevent the browser from interpreting specific parts of the style sheet. By design, comments have no effect on the layout of a document.
trans-unit.target: CSS 注释用于在代码中添加说明性注释，或用于防止浏览器解释样式表的特定部分。通过设计，注释不会影响文档的布局。

trans-unit.source: A CSS pseudo-element is a keyword added to a selector that lets you style a specific part of the selected element(s). For example, ::first-line can be used to change the font of the first line of a paragraph.
trans-unit.target: CSS 伪元素是添加到选择器中的关键字，可用于设置所选元素的特定部分的样式。例如， ::first-line 可用于更改段落第一行的字体。

trans-unit.source: A CSS counter can be especially useful for making outlined lists, because a new instance of the counter is automatically created in child elements. Using the counters() function, separating text can be inserted between different levels of nested counters.
trans-unit.target: CSS计数器对于创建概述列表尤其有用，因为会在子元素中自动创建该计数器的新实例。使用 counters() 函数，可以在不同级别的嵌套计数器之间插入分隔文本。

trans-unit.source: A CSS gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element to which it applies.
trans-unit.target: CSS渐变没有内在尺寸；即，它没有自然的或优选的尺寸，也没有优选的比例。它的具体大小将与其所应用的元素的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: A Complete Guide to Flexbox | CSS-Tricks
trans-unit.target: Flexbox的完整指南|CSS-Tricks。

trans-unit.source: A URL that designates an external resource (such as an image). If the resource can't be displayed, it is either ignored or a placeholder is shown.
trans-unit.target: 指定外部资源(如图片)的URL。如果资源无法显示,则会被忽略或显示一个占位符。

trans-unit.source: A background position can be added either as two x, y values after the url() in the background, or as background-position. For example:
trans-unit.target: 可以将背景位置添加为 url() 之后的两个x，y值，也可以作为 background-position 添加。例如：

trans-unit.source: A background with the following properties ...
trans-unit.target: 具有以下属性的背景...

trans-unit.source: A background, being an image or a color, is clipped at the border, even a rounded one; the exact location of the clipping is defined by the value of the background-clip property.
trans-unit.target: 背景（是图像或颜色）被剪切在边框上，甚至是圆形的。裁剪的确切位置由 background-clip 属性的值定义。

trans-unit.source: A balanced set of columns is where all columns have approximately the same amount of content. Filling and balancing comes into play when the amount of content does not match the amount of space provided, such as when a height is declared on the container.
trans-unit.target: 一组平衡的列是指所有列的内容量大致相同。当内容量与提供的空间量不匹配时,如在容器上声明高度时,填充和平衡就会发挥作用。

trans-unit.target: 基本线性梯度

trans-unit.target: 基本径向梯度

trans-unit.source: A bitmap image (such as JPG) always has intrinsic dimensions and proportions.
trans-unit.target: 一个位图图像(如JPG)总是有内在的尺寸和比例。

trans-unit.source: A black foreground leads to no change. A foreground with the inverse color of the backdrop leads to a fully lit color.
trans-unit.target: 黑色的前景会导致没有变化。前景与背景的颜色相反,会导致颜色完全亮起来。

trans-unit.source: A black layer has no effect, while a white layer inverts the other layer's color.
trans-unit.target: 黑色图层没有任何效果,而白色图层则会反转其他图层的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A black layer leads to a black final layer, and a white layer leads to no change.
trans-unit.target: 黑色层导致最后一层黑色,白色层导致没有变化。

trans-unit.source: A black layer leads to no change, and a white layer leads to a white final layer.
trans-unit.target: 黑色的一层导致没有变化,白色的一层导致白色的最后一层。

trans-unit.source: A block element with similar styles as above and no fragmentation results in:
trans-unit.target: 块元素的风格与上述相似,且没有碎片化的结果。

trans-unit.source: A block-level box may also be a block container box. A block container box is a box that contains only other block-level boxes, or creates an inline formatting context, thus containing only inline boxes.
trans-unit.target: 块级盒子也可以是块容器盒子。阿块容器盒是只包含其他块级框，或创建一个盒子内联格式化上下文，因而只含行内框。

trans-unit.source: A block-level box will establish a new block formatting context, meaning that if its inner display type would be flow, it will get a computed display type of flow-root. This is shown in the next example where the box which displays as horizontal-tb contains a float which is contained due to its parent establishing a new BFC.
trans-unit.target: 块级框将建立新的块格式化上下文，这意味着如果其内部显示类型为 flow ，则它将获得计算出的显示类型 flow-root 。这在下一个示例中显示，其中显示为 horizontal-tb 的框包含一个浮点数，该浮点数是由于其父级建立了新的BFC而包含的。

trans-unit.source: A bounce effect is shown when the user hits a scroll limit during any manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在任何操作过程中触及到滚动限制时,就会显示出一个反弹效果。

trans-unit.source: A closing bracket or quote at the end of the last formatted line of an element hangs.
trans-unit.target: 在元素的最后一行格式化的结尾处有一个括号或引号挂起。

trans-unit.source: A collapsed track is treated as having a fixed track sizing function of 0px, and the gutters on either side of it collapse.
trans-unit.target: 折叠的轨道被视为具有固定的轨道大小调整功能 0px ，并且其任一侧的装订线都折叠。

trans-unit.source: A color-stop's <color> value, followed by an optional stop position (either a <percentage> or a <length> along the gradient's axis).
trans-unit.target: 色标的 <color> 值，后跟一个可选的色标位置（沿着渐变轴的 <percentage> 或 <length> ）。

trans-unit.source: A color-stop's <color> value, followed by an optional stop position (either a <percentage> or a <length> along the gradient's axis). A percentage of 0%, or a length of 0, represents the center of the gradient; the value 100% represents the intersection of the ending shape with the virtual gradient ray. Percentage values in between are linearly positioned on the gradient ray.
trans-unit.target: 色标的 <color> 值，后跟一个可选的色标位置（沿着渐变轴的 <percentage> 或 <length> ）。百分比为 0% 或长度为 0 表示渐变的中心；值 100% 表示最终形状与虚拟渐变射线的交集。介于两者之间的百分比值线性地位于渐变射线上。

trans-unit.source: A colorful table of browser engines
trans-unit.target: 浏览器引擎的彩色表格

trans-unit.source: A column box can contain other markup and there are many places where a break would not be ideal. For example, we would generally prefer that the figcaption of an image not be separated into a new column away from the image it refers to and ending a column with a heading looks strange. The fragmentation properties give us ways to exercise some control over this.
trans-unit.target: 一个列框可以包含其他标记,而且有很多地方的中断是不理想的。例如,我们通常希望图片的 figcaption 不要脱离它所引用的图片而被分隔成一个新的列,而且用标题来结束一列看起来很奇怪。分割属性为我们提供了一些控制的方法。

trans-unit.source: A combination of the ::before pseudo-element and the content property may inject some text at the beginning of the element. In that case, ::first-letter will match the first letter of this generated content.
trans-unit.target: 的组合 ::before 伪元素和 content 属性可以在元素的开始注入一些文本。在这种情况下， ::first-letter 将匹配此生成内容的首字母。

trans-unit.source: A common pattern for navigation is to have a list of items displayed as a horizontal bar. This pattern, as basic as it seems, was difficult to achieve before flexbox. It forms the most simple of flexbox examples, and could be considered the ideal flexbox use case.
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的导航模式是将一个项目列表以横条的形式显示。这种模式虽然看起来很基本,但在flexbox之前是很难实现的。它形成了最简单的flexbox示例,可以被认为是理想的flexbox使用案例。

trans-unit.source: A common pattern is a navigation bar where some key items are aligned to the right, with the main group on the left. You might think that this should be a use case for a justify-self property, however consider the image below. I have three items on one side and two on the other. If I were able to use justify-self on item d, it would also change the alignment of item e that follows, which may or may not be my intention.
trans-unit.target: 一种常见的模式是导航栏，其中一些关键项在右侧对齐，主要组在左侧。您可能会认为这应该是 justify-self 属性的用例，但是请考虑下图。我的一侧有三个项目，另一侧有两个项目。如果我能够在项目d上使用“ justify-self ，那么它也会改变后面的项目e的对齐方式，这可能是我的意图，也可能不是我的意图。

trans-unit.source: A common question is to ask what the difference is between Flexbox and CSS Grid Layout — why do we have two specifications that sometimes appear to be doing the same thing?
trans-unit.target: 一个常见的问题是问Flexbox和CSS Grid Layout有什么区别-为什么我们有两个有时看起来在做相同事情的规范？

trans-unit.source: A common question then is how to make those items line up. This is where you want a two-dimensional layout method: You want to control the alignment by row and column, and this is where grid comes in.
trans-unit.target: 那么一个常见的问题就是如何让这些项目排成一排。这时你就需要一个二维的布局方法。你想通过行和列来控制排列,这就是网格的作用。

trans-unit.source: A common use for sticky positioning is for the headings in an alphabetized list. The "B" heading will appear just below the items that begin with "A" until they are scrolled offscreen. Rather than sliding offscreen with the rest of the content, the "B" heading will then remain fixed to the top of the viewport until all the "B" items have scrolled offscreen, at which point it will be covered up by the "C" heading, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 粘性定位的一个常见用途是用于按字母顺序排列的列表中的标题。B "标题将出现在以 "A "开头的项目下面,直到它们被滚动到屏幕外。B "标题不会和其他内容一起滑出屏幕,而是固定在视口的顶部,直到所有 "B "项都滚动到屏幕外,这时它将被 "C "标题覆盖,依此类推。

trans-unit.source: A common use of CSS is to highlight items in a menu as the user hovers the mouse cursor over them. It's easy to use transitions to make the effect even more attractive.
trans-unit.target: CSS的一个常见用法是当用户将鼠标光标悬停在菜单中的项目上时,突出显示这些项目。很容易使用转场来使效果更有吸引力。

trans-unit.source: A context menu is available.
trans-unit.target: 有一个上下文菜单。

trans-unit.target: jQuery的跨浏览器2D 变换插件

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bézier curve is defined by four points P0, P1, P2, and P3. P0 and P3 are the start and the end of the curve and, in CSS these points are fixed as the coordinates are ratios (the abscissa the ratio of time, the ordinate the ratio of the output range). P0 is (0, 0) and represents the initial time and the initial state, P3 is (1, 1) and represents the final time and the final state.
trans-unit.target: 三次贝塞尔曲线由四个点P 0，P 1，P 2和P 3定义。 P 0和P 3是曲线的起点和终点，在CSS中，这些点是固定的，因为坐标是比例（横坐标是时间比例，纵坐标是输出范围比例）。 P 0为 (0, 0) ，代表初始时间和初始状态，P 3为 (1, 1) ，代表最终时间和最终状态。

trans-unit.source: A custom control, such as a custom element button, can use :focus-visible to selectively apply a focus indicator only on keyboard-focus. This matches the native focus behavior for controls like <button>.
trans-unit.target: 自定义控件（例如自定义元素按钮）可以使用 :focus-visible 来仅将焦点指示器应用于键盘焦点。这与 <button> 之类的控件的本机焦点行为匹配。

trans-unit.source: A custom property’s name represented by an identifier that starts with two dashes. Custom properties are solely for use by authors and users; CSS will never give them a meaning beyond what is presented here.
trans-unit.target: 定制属性的名称由以两个破折号开头的标识符表示。自定义属性仅供作者和用户使用；CSS绝不会赋予它们超出此处所提供含义的含义。

trans-unit.source: A declaration of touch action: none; may inhibit operating a browser's zooming capabilities. This will prevent people experiencing low vision conditions from being able to read and understand page content.
trans-unit.target: touch action: none; 的声明：无；可能会禁止操作浏览器的缩放功能。这将防止处于弱视状态的人们能够阅读和理解页面内容。

trans-unit.source: A different pattern for navigation would be to distribute the available space within the items themselves, rather than create space between them. In this case we would use the flex properties to allow items to grow and shrink in proportion to one another as described in Controlling ratios of flex items along the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 导航的另一种模式是在项目本身内部分配可用空间，而不是在项目之间创建空间。在这种情况下，我们将使用 flex 属性来允许项目彼此成比例地增长和收缩，如控制沿主轴的flex项目的比率中所述。

trans-unit.source: A drop shadow is effectively a blurred, offset version of the input image's alpha mask, drawn in a specific color and composited below the image.
trans-unit.target: 阴影实际上是输入图像的alpha蒙版的模糊、偏移版本,以特定的颜色绘制并合成在图像下方。

trans-unit.source: A further bug means that animations using em units are not affected by changes to the font-size on the animated element's parent, whereas they should be (bug 1254424). Quantum CSS fixes this.
trans-unit.target: 另一个错误意味着使用em单位的动画不受动画元素父元素上的 font-size 更改的影响，而应该受到影响（错误1254424）。Quantum CSS可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: A generic 3D affine transformation can't be represented using a Cartesian-coordinate matrix, as translations are not linear transformations.
trans-unit.target: 通用3D 仿射变换无法使用笛卡尔坐标矩阵表示，因为平移不是线性变换。

trans-unit.source: A grid can contain a mixture of items. Some of the items may have a position on the grid, but others may be auto-placed. This can be helpful, if you have a document order that reflects the order in which items sit on the grid you may not need to write CSS rules to place absolutely everything. The specification contains a long section detailing the Grid item placement algorithm, however for most of us we just need to remember a few simple rules for our items.
trans-unit.target: 网格可以包含多个项目。一些项目可能在网格上具有位置，但是其他项目可能会自动放置。如果您的文档顺序可以反映项目在网格上的排列顺序，那么这可能会有所帮助，您可能无需编写CSS规则即可放置所有内容。该规范包含一长节，详细介绍了网格项目放置算法，但是对于我们大多数人来说，我们只需要记住一些关于项目的简单规则即可。

trans-unit.source: A grid container as containing block
trans-unit.target: 包含块的网格容器

trans-unit.source: A grid container as parent
trans-unit.target: 一个网格容器作为父容器

trans-unit.source: A grid is an intersecting set of horizontal and vertical lines – one set defining columns and the other rows. Elements can be placed onto the grid, respecting these column and row lines. CSS grid layout has the following features:
trans-unit.target: 网格是水平线和垂直线的交集-一组定义列，而另一列定义行。可以将元素放置在网格上，并遵守这些列线和行线。CSS网格布局具有以下功能：

trans-unit.source: A grid item can become a grid container. In the following example, I have the three-column grid that I created earlier, with our two positioned items. In this case the first item has some sub-items. As these items are not direct children of the grid they do not participate in grid layout and so display in a normal document flow.
trans-unit.target: 一个网格项可以成为一个网格容器。在下面的例子中,我有一个我之前创建的三栏网格,有两个定位的项目。在这个例子中,第一个项有一些子项。由于这些项不是网格的直接子项,它们不参与网格布局,所以在正常的文档流中显示。

trans-unit.source: A grid layout should mean we do not need to change our document source in order to get the layout that we want. Therefore the starting point of your page should be a well structured and accessible source document. As is noted in the CSS Grid Layout specification, this is quite often going to give you a good structure for your smallest screen devices too. If a user is scrolling through a long document on mobile, the priorities for that user quite often map to what should be a priority in the source.
trans-unit.target: 网格布局应意味着我们无需更改文档源即可获取所需的布局。因此，页面的起点应该是结构良好且易于访问的源文档。正如CSS网格布局规范中所指出的那样，这通常也可以为最小的屏幕设备提供良好的结构。如果用户在移动设备上滚动浏览较长的文档，则该用户的优先级通常会映射到源中应具有的优先级。

trans-unit.source: A guide to the coordinate systems used to specify the position of a location in a display context, whether that context is a window on a monitor, a viewport on a mobile device, or a position on a sheet of paper when printing.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定显示环境中位置的坐标系指南,无论该环境是显示器上的窗口、移动设备上的视口,还是打印时纸张上的位置。

trans-unit.source: A guide to using CSS to apply color to a variety of types of content. All color-related CSS properties are touched upon.
trans-unit.target: 使用CSS将颜色应用到各种类型的内容的指南。所有与颜色相关的CSS属性都会涉及到。

trans-unit.target: 带有重点形状和颜色的标题

trans-unit.source: A key concept of working with flow relative properties and values is the two dimensions of block and inline. As we saw above, newer CSS layout methods such as Flexbox and Grid Layout use the concepts of block and inline rather than right and left/top and bottom when aligning items.
trans-unit.target: 处理流的相关属性和值的关键概念是块和内联的二维。正如我们上面看到的，新的CSS布局的方法，如Flexbox，就和网格布局使用的概念 block 和 inline ，而不是 right 和 left / top 和 bottom 对齐项目时。

trans-unit.source: A key feature of flexbox is the ability to align and justify items on the main- and cross-axes, and to distribute space between flex items.
trans-unit.target: flexbox的一个关键功能是能够在主轴和横轴上对齐和证明项目,并在flex项目之间分配空间。

trans-unit.source: A keyframe's timing function is applied on a property-by-property basis from the keyframe on which it is specified until the next keyframe specifying that property, or until the end of the animation if there is no subsequent keyframe specifying that property. As a result, an animation-timing-function specified on the 100% or to keyframe will never be used.
trans-unit.target: 从指定关键帧的属性开始，逐个属性地应用关键帧的计时功能，直到指定该属性的下一个关键帧为止，或者如果没有后续的关键帧指定该属性，则直到动画结束。其结果是，一个 animation-timing-function 在指定的 100% 或 to 关键帧将永远不会被使用。

trans-unit.target: 指示该属性对网格项的放置没有任何作用的关键字，指示自动放置，自动跨度或默认跨度 1 。

trans-unit.source: A keyword that is the inverse of contain. Scales the image as large as possible and maintains image aspect ratio (image doesn't get squished). The image "covers" the entire width or height of the container. When the image and container have different dimensions, the image is clipped either on left/right or at top/bottom.
trans-unit.target: 与contains相反的 contain 。尽可能缩放图像并保持图像长宽比（图像不会被压缩）。该图像“覆盖”了容器的整个宽度或高度。当图像和容器的尺寸不同时，图像将在左侧/右侧或顶部/底部被剪切。

trans-unit.source: A keyword that scales the image as large as possible and maintains image aspect ratio (image doesn't get squished). The image is letterboxed within the container. The image is automatically centered unless over-ridden by another property such as mask-position.
trans-unit.target: 一个关键字，它会尽可能地缩放图像并保持图像的宽高比（图像不会被压缩）。图像在容器中用信箱表示。图像会自动居中，除非被另一个属性（例如 mask-position )覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A keyword that scales the mask image in the corresponding directions in order to maintain its intrinsic proportion.
trans-unit.target: 一个关键字,在相应的方向上对蒙版图像进行缩放,以保持其固有比例。

trans-unit.source: A keyword with a predefined meaning appears literally, without quotation marks. For example: auto, smaller or ease-in.
trans-unit.target: 具有预定义含义的关键字按字面意义出现，不带引号。例如： auto ， smaller 或 ease-in 。

trans-unit.source: A large positive or negative letter-spacing value will make the word(s) the styling is applied to unreadable. For text styled with a very large positive value, the letters will be so far apart that the word(s) will appear like a series of individual, unconnected letters. For text styled with a very large negative value, the letters will overlap each other to the point where the word(s) may be unrecognizable.
trans-unit.target: 较大的正或负 letter-spacing 值将使应用样式的单词不可读。对于具有非常大的正值样式的文本，字母之间的距离会太远，以至于单词将看起来像一系列单独的，未连接的字母。对于具有非常大的负值样式的文本，字母将相互重叠，直到单词可能无法识别的地步。

trans-unit.source: A large positive or negative word-spacing value will make the sentences the styling is applied to unreadable. For text styled with a very large positive value, the words will be so far apart that it will no longer appear to be a sentence. For text styled with a large negative value, the words will overlap each other to the point where the the beginning and end of each word is unrecognizable.
trans-unit.target: 较大的正或负 word-spacing 值将使应用样式的句子难以理解。对于具有非常大的正值样式的文本，单词将相距太远，以致不再显示为句子。对于带有大负值样式的文本，这些单词将彼此重叠，直到每个单词的开头和结尾都无法识别的地步。

trans-unit.source: A length or percentage that specifies a 2D translation, with the same translation along both the X and Y axes. Equivalent to a translate() (2D translation) function with a single value specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定2D平移的长度或百分比，沿X和Y轴具有相同的平移。等效于指定了单个值的 translate() （二维翻译）函数。

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient creates a band of colors that progress in a straight line.
trans-unit.target: 线性渐变会产生一条直线上的颜色带。

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient is defined by an axis—the gradient line—and two or more color-stop points. Each point on the axis is a distinct color; to create a smooth gradient, the linear-gradient() function draws a series of colored lines perpendicular to the gradient line, each one matching the color of the point where it intersects the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 线性渐变由一条轴（渐变线）和两个或多个颜色终止点定义。轴上的每个点都是不同的颜色。为了创建平滑的渐变， linear-gradient() 函数绘制了一系列与渐变线垂直的彩色线，每个彩色线都与渐变线相交的点的颜色匹配。

trans-unit.source: A media query computes to true when the media type (if specified) matches the device on which a document is being displayed and all media feature expressions compute as true. Queries involving unknown media types are always false.
trans-unit.target: 当媒体类型（如果指定）与在其上显示文档的设备匹配并且所有媒体功能表达式都计算为true 时，媒体查询将计算为true。涉及未知媒体类型的查询始终为假。

trans-unit.source: A name identifying the animation. This identifier is composed of a combination of case-insensitive letters a to z, numbers 0 to 9, underscores (_), and/or dashes (-). The first non-dash character must be a letter. Also, two dashes are forbidden at the beginning of the identifier. Furthermore, the identifier can't be none, unset, initial, or inherit.
trans-unit.target: 标识动画的名称。该标识符由不区分大小写的字母 a 到 z ，数字 0 到 9 ，下划线（ _ ）和/或破折号（ - ）组成。第一个非破折号字符必须是字母。另外，标识符的开头禁止使用两个破折号。此外，标识符不能为 none ， unset ， initial 或 inherit 。

trans-unit.source: A negative value causes the animation to begin immediately, but partway through its cycle. For example, if you specify -1s as the animation delay time, the animation will begin immediately but will start 1 second into the animation sequence. If you specify a negative value for the animation delay, but the starting value is implicit, the starting value is taken from the moment the animation is applied to the element.
trans-unit.target: 负值会导致动画立即开始，但在动画周期的中途开始。例如，如果您指定 -1s 作为动画延迟时间，则动画将立即开始，但将从动画序列开始1秒。如果为动画延迟指定一个负值，但起始值是隐式的，则起始值将从将动画应用于元素的那一刻开始。

trans-unit.source: A negative value will begin the transition effect immediately, and partway through the effect. In other words, the effect will be animated as if it had already been running for the given length of time.

The user-agent may adjust the intrinsic size contributions of the track to the size of the grid container and increase the final size of the track by the minimum amount that would result in honoring the percentage.

trans-unit.source: A recent addition to the Box Alignment specification has been the row-gap and column-gap properties, along with the shorthand gap. These properties were initially defined in the CSS Grid specification and named grid-row-gap, grid-column-gap and grid-gap. They have been renamed and moved to Box Alignment in order that they can be used in all layout methods — this will ultimately include flexbox. Until browsers implement the gap properties for flexbox, margins have to be used to create gaps between items.

trans-unit.source: Absolute length units represent a physical measurement when the physical properties of the output medium are known, such as for print layout. This is done by anchoring one of the units to a physical unit, and then defining the others relative to it. The anchor is done differently for low-resolution devices, such as screens, versus high-resolution devices, such as printers.
trans-unit.target: 当输出介质的物理属性已知时,绝对长度单位代表了一种物理测量,例如用于印刷排版。这是通过将其中一个单位锚定在一个物理单位上,然后相对于它定义其他单位来实现的。对于低分辨率设备(如屏幕)和高分辨率设备(如打印机),锚定的方式是不同的。

trans-unit.source: Addressing each item individually we can place all four items spanning row and column tracks. Note that we can leave cells empty if we wish. One of the very nice things about Grid Layout is this ability to have white space in our designs without having to push things around using margins to prevent floats from rising up into the space we have left.

trans-unit.source: After all variables are expanded, widthC's value will be calc( calc( 100px / 2) / 2), then when it's assigned to .foo's width property, all inner calc()s (no matter how deeply nested) will be flattened to just parentheses, so the width property's value will be eventually calc( ( 100px / 2) / 2), i.e. 25px. In short: a calc() inside of a calc() is identical to just parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 扩展所有变量后， widthC 的值为 calc( calc( 100px / 2) / 2) ，然后将其分配给 .foo 的width属性时，所有内部 calc() s（无论嵌套深度如何）都将将其展平为仅括号，因此 width 属性的值最终将为 calc( ( 100px / 2) / 2) ，即 25px 。简而言之： calc() 内部的 calc() 等同于括号。

trans-unit.source: After setting up a mobile layout we will get this single column at all screen sizes, we can now add a media query and redefine our layout for the circumstance of having enough screen real estate to show two columns.
trans-unit.target: 设置好移动版式后，我们将获得所有屏幕尺寸的这一列，现在，我们可以添加媒体查询并重新定义我们的版式，以确保有足够的屏幕空间来显示两列。

trans-unit.source: After that come the classes "horizontal" and "vertical", which add the writing-mode property to the box, with the value set to horizontal-tb or vertical-rl depending on which class is used.
trans-unit.target: 然后是 "horizontal" 和 "vertical" ，它们向框中添加了 writing-mode 属性，其值根据所使用的类设置为 horizontal-tb 或 vertical-rl 。

trans-unit.source: After the user agent has finished its calculations, every CSS property has a used value. The used values of dimensions (e.g., width, line-height) are in pixels. The used values of shorthand properties (e.g., background) are consistent with those of their component properties (e.g., background-color or background-size) and with position and float.
trans-unit.target: 在经过用户代理完成其计算，每个CSS属性有使用的值。尺寸的使用值（例如 width ， line-height ）以像素为单位。速记属性（例如 background ）的使用值与其组件属性（例如 background-color 或 background-size ）的使用值以及 position 和 float 一致。

trans-unit.source: After your content has finished altering styles, it may find itself in a situation where it needs to restore them to a known state. This may happen in cases of animations, theme changes, and so forth. The CSS property all lets you quickly set (almost) everything in CSS back to a known state.
trans-unit.target: 您的内容完成样式更改后，它可能会发现自己需要将其还原到已知状态。在动画，主题更改等情况下可能会发生这种情况。 all 使用CSS属性，您可以将CSS中的所有内容快速（几乎）设置为已知状态。

trans-unit.source: Alignment is linked to writing modes in that when we align an item we do not consider whether we are aligning it to the physical dimensions of top, right, bottom and left. Instead we describe alignment in terms of the start and end of the particular dimension we are working with. This ensures that alignment works in the same way whichever writing mode the document has.
trans-unit.target: 对齐与书写模式相关联,因为当我们对一个项目进行对齐时,我们并不考虑是否按照上、右、下、左的物理维度进行对齐。相反,我们用我们正在处理的特定维度的开始和结束来描述对齐。这确保了无论文档采用哪种写作模式,对齐方式都是一样的。

trans-unit.source: All full-screen elements are placed in a last-in/first out (LIFO) stack in the top layer, which is a special layer in the viewport which is always rendered last (and therefore on top) before drawing the viewport's contents to the screen. The ::backdrop pseudo-element makes it possible to obscure, style, or completely hide everything located below the element when it's the topmost one in the top layer.
trans-unit.target: 所有全屏元素都放置在顶层的后进先出（LIFO）堆栈中，顶层是视口中的一个特殊层，在将视口的内容绘制到视口之前，该图层总是在最后（因此位于最顶层）呈现。屏幕。该 ::backdrop 伪元素能够掩盖，风格，或者完全隐藏一切位于该元件下方时，它的最上面的一个顶层。

trans-unit.source: All the direct children are now grid items. In a web browser, you won’t see any difference to how these items are displayed before turning them into a grid, as grid has created a single column grid for the items. At this point, you may find it useful to work with the Grid Inspector, available as part of Firefox's Developer Tools. If you view this example in Firefox and inspect the grid, you will see a small icon next to the value grid. Click this and then the grid on this element will be overlaid in the browser window.

trans-unit.source: Also in this example we are using margins on the flex items to create a gap between items, and a negative margin on the container in order that the items still remain flush with the right and left edges. Until the gap properties from the Box Alignment specification are implemented in flexbox, we have to use margins in this way if we want to create a gutter between items.
trans-unit.target: 同样在此示例中，我们使用弹性项目上的边距在项目之间创建间隙，并在容器上使用负边距，以使项目仍保持与左右边缘齐平。在flexbox中实现Box Alignment规范的 gap 属性之前，如果要在项目之间创建装订线，则必须以这种方式使用边距。

trans-unit.source: Also note that values within @keyframes at-rules overwrite all normal values but are overwritten by !important values.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意， @keyframes 规则中的值会覆盖所有普通值，但会被 !important 值覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Also, be aware that other things may increase the visual gap displayed, for example using the space distribution keywords or adding margins to items.
trans-unit.target: 另外,要注意其他东西可能会增加显示的视觉差距,例如使用空间分布关键词或给项目添加边距。

trans-unit.source: Also, having removed the box you cannot then use it to — for example — add a background colour behind the nested sub children. If you remove display: contents in this live example you will see that the direct child we are removing has an orange background colour. This also disappears when the box disappears.
trans-unit.target: 同样，删除该框后，您将无法再使用它，例如，在嵌套的子子项后面添加背景色。如果删除 display: contents 在此实时示例中，您将看到我们要删除的直接子对象具有橙色背景色。当该框消失时，这也将消失。

trans-unit.source: Also, remember that items on the grid can overlap each other when you place them explicitly like this. That can create some nice effects, however you can also end up with things overlapping incorrectly if you specify the wrong start or end line. The Firefox Grid Highlighter can be very useful as you learn, especially if your grid is quite complicated.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请记住，当您像这样明确放置它们时，网格上的项目可能会彼此重叠。这样可以产生一些不错的效果，但是如果您指定了错误的开始或结束行，您也可能最终会重叠错误。在Firefox的网格荧光笔可以像你学习非常有用的，尤其是如果您的网格是相当复杂的。

trans-unit.source: Although the positioning fixes in Firefox 3.5 do not allow content to be generated as a separate previous sibling (as per the CSS spec stating "The :before and :after pseudo-elements elements interact with other boxes... as if they were real elements inserted just inside their associated element."), they can be used to provide a slight improvement on tableless layouts (e.g., to achieve centering) in that, as long as the content to be centered is wrapped in a further child, a column before and after the content can be introduced without adding a previous or following sibling (i.e., it is perhaps more semantically correct to add an additional span as below, than it would to add an empty <div/> before and after). (And always remember to add a width to a float, since, otherwise, it will not float!)
trans-unit.target: 尽管Firefox 3.5中的定位修复程序不允许将内容作为单独的先前同级元素生成（根据CSS规范说明，“：before和：after伪元素元素与其他框进行交互……就好像它们是真实元素一样）。插入它们相关元素的内部。”），它们可以用于对无表布局进行一点改进（例如，实现居中），只要将要居中的内容包装在另一个子目录中，并且可以在不引入前一个或后一个同级元素的情况下引入内容（即，在语义上添加如下所示的附加跨度比在之前和之后添加空的<div />在语义上更正确）。 （并且始终记住为浮动对象添加宽度，否则，它将不会浮动！）

trans-unit.source: An absolutely positioned element is an element whose computedposition value is absolute or fixed. The top, right, bottom, and left properties specify offsets from the edges of the element's containing block. (The containing block is the ancestor relative to which the element is positioned.) If the element has margins, they are added to the offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个绝对定位的元素是一种元素，其计算 position 值是 absolute 或 fixed 。的 top ， right ， bottom 和 left 属性指定，通过元素的边缘偏移量的包含块。 （包含块是元素相对于其放置的祖先。）如果元素具有边距，则将它们添加到偏移量中。

trans-unit.source: An at-rule is a CSS statement that instructs CSS how to behave. They begin with an at sign, '@' (U+0040 COMMERCIAL AT), followed by an identifier and includes everything up to the next semicolon, ';' (U+003B SEMICOLON), or the next CSS block, whichever comes first.

trans-unit.source: An element is said to be block-level when the calculated value of its display CSS property is: block, list-item, or table. A block-level element is visually formatted as a block (e.g., paragraph), intended to be vertically stacked.
trans-unit.target: 当元素的 display CSS属性的计算值是： block ， list-item 或 table 时，该元素被称为块级。块级元素在视觉上被格式化为旨在垂直堆叠的块（例如，段落）。

trans-unit.source: An element is said to be inline-level when the calculated value of its display CSS property is: inline, inline-block or inline-table. Visually, it doesn't constitute blocks of contents, but is distributed in lines with other inline-level content. Typically, the content of a paragraph with different formatting, like emphasis or images, is made from inline-level elements.
trans-unit.target: 当一个元素的 display CSS属性的计算值为： inline ， inline-block 或 inline-table 时，该元素被称为inline级。从视觉上看，它并不构成内容块，而是与其他内联级别的内容成行分布。通常，具有不同格式（如重点或图像）的段落内容由内联级别的元素组成。

trans-unit.source: Anonymous items are always auto-placed because there is no way to target them. Therefore if you have some unwrapped text for some reason in your grid, be aware that it might show up somewhere unexpected as it will be auto-placed according to the auto-placement rules.
trans-unit.target: 匿名项总是被自动放置,因为没有办法锁定它们。因此,如果你在你的网格中由于某种原因有一些未包装的文本,请注意它可能会出现在某个意想不到的地方,因为它将根据自动放置规则自动放置。

trans-unit.source: Another Gecko bug means that <details> elements can't be made open by default using the open attribute if they have an animation active on them (bug 1382124). Quantum CSS fixes this.
trans-unit.target: 另一个Gecko错误意味着，如果 <details> 元素上具有活动的动画，则默认情况下不能使用 open 属性将其打开（错误1382124）。Quantum CSS可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: Another case that leads to the creation of anonymous block boxes, is an inline box that contains one or several block boxes. In that case, the box containing the block box is split into two inline boxes: one before, and one after the block box. All the inline boxes before the block box are then enclosed in an anonymous block box, so are the inline boxes following the block box. Therefore, the block box becomes the sibling of the two anonymous block boxes containing the inline elements.
trans-unit.target: 导致创建匿名阻止框的另一种情况是包含一个或多个阻止框的内联框。在这种情况下，包含阻止框的框将分为两个串联框：一个在阻止框之前，一个在阻止框之后。然后，将阻止框之前的所有内联框都包含在匿名阻止框中，并将阻止框后面的内嵌框也包含在内。因此，块框成为包含内联元素的两个匿名块框的兄弟。

trans-unit.source: Another common pattern is that of an image carousel which uses pointer events to handle horizontal panning, but doesn't want to interfere with vertical scrolling or zooming of the document.
trans-unit.target: 另一种常见的模式是图像旋转木马,它使用指针事件来处理水平平移,但又不想干扰文档的垂直滚动或缩放。

trans-unit.source: Another issue to be aware of in CSS Grid Layout and to a lesser extent in CSS Flexbox, is the temptation to flatten markup. As we have discovered, for an item to become a grid item it needs to be a direct child of the grid container. Therefore, where you have a <ul> element inside a grid container, thatul becomes a grid item – the child <li> elements do not.
trans-unit.target: 在CSS网格布局中以及CSS Flexbox中需要注意的另一个问题是扁平化标记的诱惑。我们已经发现，要使一个项目成为网格项目，它必须是网格容器的直接子代。因此，在网格容器内有 <ul> 元素的情况下，该 ul 成为网格项-子 <li> 元素则没有。

trans-unit.source: Another place you might see physical keywords in use, is when using text-align: right to align text to the right. There are also physical properties in CSS. We add margins, padding, and borders using these physical properties of margin-left, padding-left, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 您可能会看到使用物理关键字的另一个地方是使用 text-align: right 将文本向右对齐。CSS 中也有物理属性。我们使用 margin-left ， padding-left 等的这些物理属性添加边距，内边距和边框。

trans-unit.source: Another use case for calc() is to help ensure that form fields fit in the available space, without extruding past the edge of their container, while maintaining an appropriate margin.
trans-unit.target: calc() 的另一个用例是帮助确保表单字段适合可用空间，而不会超出其容器的边缘，同时保持适当的边距。

trans-unit.source: Another use case for CSS functions is allow a font size to grow while ensuring it is at least a mimum size, enabling responsive font sizes while ensuring legibility, and providing a maximum size so it doesn't grow too huge..
trans-unit.target: CSS函数的另一个用例是允许字体大小增长,同时保证它至少是一个最小尺寸,在保证可读性的前提下实现响应的字体大小,并提供一个最大的尺寸,使它不至于长得太大。

trans-unit.source: Another use case for CSS functions is allow a font size to grow while ensuring it is at least a mimum size, enabling responsive font sizes while ensuring legibility.
trans-unit.target: CSS函数的另一个用例是允许字体大小增长,同时保证字体大小至少是最小值,在保证可读性的前提下实现响应的字体大小。

trans-unit.source: Another use case for CSS functions is to set a maximum size on responsive form controls: enabling the width of labels and inputs to shrink as the width of the form shrinks
trans-unit.target: CSS函数的另一个用例是在响应式表单控件上设置最大尺寸:使标签和输入的宽度随着表单宽度的缩小而缩小。

trans-unit.source: Another useful resource is Clippy - a tool for creating shapes for clip-path, as the values for Basic Shapes are the same as those used for clip-path.
trans-unit.target: 另一种有用的资源是大眼夹 -用于创建形状的工具 clip-path ，作为基本形状的值是相同的那些用于 clip-path 。

trans-unit.source: Another vital area of understanding is how flexbox makes no assumption about the writing mode of the document. In the past, CSS was heavily weighted towards horizontal and left-to-right writing modes. Modern layout methods encompass the range of writing modes and so we no longer assume that a line of text will start at the top left of a document and run towards the right hand side, with new lines appearing one under the other.
trans-unit.target: 另一个重要的理解领域是flexbox如何不假设文档的书写模式。在过去,CSS严重偏重于水平和从左到右的书写模式。现代的布局方法包含了写作模式的范围,因此我们不再假设一行文字会从文档的左上角开始,然后向右侧运行,新的行数会一个接一个地出现。

trans-unit.source: Another way of setting the font size is with em values. The size of an em value is dynamic. When defining the font-size property, an em is equal to the size of the font that applies to the parent of the element in question. If you haven't set the font size anywhere on the page, then it is the browser default, which is often 16px. So, by default 1em = 16px, and 2em = 32px. If you set a font-size of 20px on the body element, then 1em = 20px and 2em = 40px. Note that the value 2 is essentially a multiplier of the current em size.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体大小的另一种方法是使用 em 值。 em 值的大小是动态的。定义 font-size 属性时，em等于应用于所讨论元素的父级的字体的大小。如果您没有在页面上的任何地方设置字体大小，则它是浏览器的默认值，通常为16px。因此，默认情况下1em = 16px，而2em = 32px。如果您在body元素上设置的 font-size 为20px，则1em = 20px和2em = 40px。注意，值2本质上是当前em大小的乘数。

trans-unit.source: Another way to align items inside their area, is to use auto margins. If you have ever centered your layout in the viewport, by setting the right and left margin of the container block to auto, you know that an auto margin absorbs all of the available space. By setting the margin to auto on both sides, it pushes the block into the middle as both margins attempt to take all of the space.
trans-unit.target: 在区域内对齐项目的另一种方法是使用自动边距。如果您曾经将布局在视口中居中，则通过将容器块的左右边距设置为 auto ，可以知道自动边距会吸收所有可用空间。通过将两侧的边距都设置为 auto ，当两个边距都试图占用所有空间时，它将块推入中间。

trans-unit.source: Another way to align items on the main axis is to use auto margins. This enables the design pattern of a navigation bar where one group of items are aligned left and another group aligned right.
trans-unit.target: 另一种在主轴上对齐项目的方法是使用自动边距。这可以实现导航栏的设计模式,即一组项目向左对齐,另一组向右对齐。

trans-unit.source: Any <number> strictly between 0 and 1
trans-unit.target: 严格在 0 到 1 之间的任何 <number>

trans-unit.source: Any <image> value
trans-unit.target: 任何 <image> 值

trans-unit.source: Any @namespace rules must follow all @charset and @import rules, and precede all other at-rules and style declarations in a style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 任何 @namespace 规则都必须遵循所有@charset和@import规则，并在样式表中的所有其他规则和样式声明之前。

trans-unit.source: Any descendant element of the multicol container may become a spanner including both direct and indirect children. For example, a heading nested directly inside the container could become a spanner, as could a heading nested inside a section nested inside the multicol container.
trans-unit.target: multicol容器的任何后代元素都可以成为包含直接和间接子代的扳手。例如，直接嵌套在容器内的标题可能会成为一个扳手，嵌套在multicol容器内嵌套的节内的标题也可能会变成扳手。

trans-unit.source: Any element that can have an image applied to it, for example as a background-image, border-image, or list-style-image.
trans-unit.target: 可以对其应用图像的任何元素，例如，作为 background-image ， border-image 或 list-style-image 。

trans-unit.source: Any length value (see <length>). The first value corresponds to the width of the page box and the second one corresponds to its height. If only one value is provided, it is used for both width and height.
trans-unit.target: 任何长度值（请参见 <length> ）。第一个值对应于页面框的宽度，第二个值对应于页面框的高度。如果仅提供一个值，则将其用于宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: Any number of text characters. Non-Latin characters must be encoded using their Unicode escape sequences: for example, \000A9 represents the copyright symbol.
trans-unit.target: 任意数量的文本字符。非拉丁字符必须使用其Unicode转义序列进行编码：例如， \000A9 表示版权符号。

trans-unit.source: Any options the user agent offers the user to allow them to control the use of color and images will take priority over the value of color-adjust. In other words, there isn't any guarantee that color-adjust will do anything. Not only can the user override the behavior, but each user agent is allowed to decide for itself how to handle color-adjust in any given situation.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理为用户提供的允许他们控制颜色使用的任何选项，图像将优先于 color-adjust 值。换句话说，不能保证 color-adjust 会做任何事情。用户不仅可以覆盖行为，而且每个用户代理都可以自行决定在任何给定情况下如何处理 color-adjust 。

trans-unit.source: Any pixels whose alpha component's value is greater than the threshold are considered to be part of the shape for the purposes of determining its boundaries. For example, a value of 0.5 means that the shape will enclose all the pixels that are more than 50% opaque.
trans-unit.target: 为了确定其边界，将其alpha分量值大于阈值的所有像素视为该形状的一部分。例如，值为 0.5 表示形状将包围不透明度超过50％的所有像素。

trans-unit.source: Any space used by gaps will be accounted for before space is assigned to the flexible length fr tracks, and gaps act for sizing purposes like a regular grid track, however you cannot place anything into a gap. In terms of line-based positioning, the gap acts like a fat line.
trans-unit.target: 在将空间分配给柔性长度 fr 轨道之前，将考虑间隙使用的任何空间，并且间隙会像常规网格轨道那样用于调整大小，但是您不能在间隙中放置任何东西。就基于线的定位而言，间隙的作用类似于粗线。

trans-unit.source: Any statement which isn't a ruleset or an at-rule is invalid and ignored.
trans-unit.target: 任何不是规则集或at-rule的语句都是无效的,并被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Any time you reorder things with grid layout – or with flexbox – you only perform visual reordering. The underlying source is what controls things like text to speech, and the tab order of the document. You can see how this works with a very simple example.
trans-unit.target: 每当您使用网格布局或flexbox对事物进行重新排序时，您仅会执行视觉重新排序。底层的源代码控制着诸如文本到语音以及文档的制表符顺序之类的事情。您可以通过一个非常简单的示例了解其工作原理。

trans-unit.source: Any time you would normally use max-height or max-width, you should instead use max-block-size to set the maximum "height" of the content (even though this may not be a vertical value) and max-inline-size to set the maximum "width" of the content (although this may instead be vertical rather than horizontal). See the Example in writing-mode, which shows the different writing modes in action.
trans-unit.target: 通常在任何时候使用 max-height 或 max-width ，您都应该改用 max-block-size 设置内容的最大“高度”（即使这可能不是垂直值）和 max-inline-size 设置内容的最大“宽度”（尽管可以改为垂直而不是水平）。参见写作模式示例，该示例显示了实际的不同写作模式。

trans-unit.source: Applies a Gaussian blur to the input image. The value of radius defines the value of the standard deviation to the Gaussian function, or how many pixels on the screen blend into each other, so a larger value will create more blur. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0. The parameter is specified as a CSS length, but does not accept percentage values.
trans-unit.target: 将高斯模糊应用于输入图像。 radius 值定义了高斯函数的标准偏差值，或屏幕上有多少像素相互融合，因此，较大的值将产生更多的模糊。插值的空白值是 0 。该参数指定为CSS长度，但不接受百分比值。

trans-unit.source: Applies a drop shadow behind the image.
trans-unit.target: 在图像后面应用一个阴影。

trans-unit.source: Applies a drop shadow effect to the input image. A drop shadow is effectively a blurred, offset version of the input image's alpha mask drawn in a particular color, composited below the image. The function accepts a parameter of type <shadow> (defined in CSS3 Backgrounds), with the exception that the inset keyword is not allowed. This function is similar to the more established box-shadow property; the difference is that with filters, some browsers provide hardware acceleration for better performance. The parameters of the <shadow> parameter are as follows.
trans-unit.target: 将阴影效果应用到输入图像。投影阴影实际上是输入图像的alpha蒙版的模糊偏移版本，以特定颜色绘制，并在图像下方进行合成。该函数接受 <shadow> 类型的参数（在CSS3背景中定义），但不允许使用 inset 关键字。此功能类似于已建立的 box-shadow 属性。不同之处在于，使用过滤器后，某些浏览器可提供硬件加速以实现更好的性能。所述的参数 <shadow> 是参数如下。

trans-unit.source: Applies a hue rotation on the input image. The value of angle defines the number of degrees around the color circle the input samples will be adjusted. A value of 0deg leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0. Though there is no maximum value, the effect of values above 360deg wraps around.
trans-unit.target: 在输入图像上应用色相旋转。 angle 的值定义了将调整输入样本的色环周围的度数。值为 0deg 会使输入保持不变。插值的空白值是 0 。尽管没有最大值，但 360deg 度以上的值会回绕。

trans-unit.source: Applies a linear multiplier to input image, making it appear more or less bright. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely black. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Other values are linear multipliers on the effect. Values of an amount over 100% are allowed, providing brighter results. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 将线性倍增器应用于输入图像，使其或多或少显得明亮。值为 0% 将创建全黑图像。值为 100% 会使输入保持不变。其他值是效果的线性乘数。允许值超过 100% ，从而提供更明亮的结果。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: Applies the first color to the scrollbar thumb, the second to the scrollbar track.
trans-unit.target: 将第一种颜色应用于滚动条的拇指,第二种颜色应用于滚动条的轨道。

trans-unit.source: Applies to
trans-unit.target: 适用于

trans-unit.source: Applies to <form> elements
trans-unit.target: 适用于<form>元素

trans-unit.source: Applies to HTML elements
trans-unit.target: 适用于HTML元素

trans-unit.source: Applies to grid and flexbox
trans-unit.target: 适用于网格和flexbox

trans-unit.source: Applies transparency to the samples in the input image. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 0% is completely transparent. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. This is equivalent to multiplying the input image samples by amount. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1. This function is similar to the more established opacity property; the difference is that with filters, some browsers provide hardware acceleration for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 将透明度应用于输入图像中的样本。的值 amount 定义了转换的比例。值为 0% 是完全透明的。值为 100% 会使输入保持不变。 0% 到 100% 之间的值是效果的线性乘数。这等效于将输入图像样本乘以数量。插值的空白值是 1 。此功能类似于已建立的 opacity 属性。不同之处在于，使用过滤器后，某些浏览器可提供硬件加速以实现更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: Applying SVG effects to HTML content
trans-unit.target: 将SVG效果应用到HTML内容中

trans-unit.source: Applying color to HTML elements using CSS

trans-unit.source: Applying the color property within the ::-ms-track selector affects the tick marks inside the track area.

trans-unit.source: Approximate range of colors that are supported by the user agent and output device
trans-unit.target: 用户代理和输出设备支持的大致颜色范围

trans-unit.source: Are <number>s describing the linear transformation.

trans-unit.source: Are <number>s describing the translation to apply.

trans-unit.source: Are <number> values representing the abscissas, and ordinates of the P1 and P2 points defining the cubic Bézier curve. x1 and x2 must be in the range [0, 1] or the value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 是表示横坐标的 <number> 值，以及定义三次贝塞尔曲线的P 1和P 2点的纵坐标。x 1和x 2必须在[0，1]范围内，否则该值无效。

trans-unit.source: Are keywords indicating in which direction the reflection is to happen.
trans-unit.target: 是表示反射要发生在哪个方向的关键词。

trans-unit.source: As align-items and align-self deal with the alignment of items on the block axis, justify-items and justify-self do the same job on the inline axis. The values you can choose from are the same as for align-self.
trans-unit.target: 由于 align-items 和 align-self 处理块轴上 justify-items justify-self ，justify-items和justify-self在嵌入式轴上执行相同的工作。您可以选择的值与 align-self 相同。

trans-unit.target: 由于CSS渐变被视为图像，因此可以通过将透明或半透明区域作为渐变的一部分来使用渐变来生成形状。

trans-unit.target: 作为 <length> 或 <percentage> ，相对于父元素的字体大小

trans-unit.target: 作为旧版浏览器的让步，我在项目上设置了 min-height ，并希望我的内容编辑器不要添加过多的内容并弄乱布局！

trans-unit.source: As a float it is first laid out according to where it would be in normal flow, then taken out of flow and moved to the left as far as possible.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个浮子,它首先要按照正常流动时的位置来布置,然后从流动中取出,尽量向左移动。

trans-unit.source: As a maximum, identical to max-content. As a minimum it represents the largest minimum size (as specified by min-width/min-height) of the grid items occupying the grid track.
trans-unit.target: 最大值与 max-content 相同。作为最小值，它代表占用网格轨道的网格项目的最大最小尺寸（由 min-width / min-height 指定）。

trans-unit.source: As a nonsense special case for (2), duplicate simple selectors to increase specificity when you have nothing more to specify.
trans-unit.target: 作为(2)的无厘头特例,当你没有更多的规定时,重复简单的选择器来增加特殊性。

trans-unit.source: As a rule of thumb, if you are adding widths to flex items in order to make items in one row of a wrapped flex container line up with the items above them you really want two-dimensional layout. In this case it is likely that the component would be better laid out using CSS Grid Layout. It isn't the case that you should use flexbox for small components and grid layout for larger ones; a tiny component can be two dimensional, and a large layout can be represented better with layout in one dimension. Try things out — we have a choice in layout method for the first time, so take advantage of it.
trans-unit.target: 根据经验，如果您要为弹性商品增加宽度，以使包装好的弹性容器中的一排商品与上方的商品对齐，那么您确实需要二维布局。在这种情况下，使用CSS网格布局可以更好地布局组件。在小型组件中不应该使用flexbox，在大型组件中应该使用网格布局。一个微小的组件可以是二维的，而较大的布局可以用一维的布局更好地表示。尝试一下-我们第一次可以选择布局方法，因此请充分利用它。

trans-unit.source: As a simple example, I have an image of a star with a solid red area and an area which is fully transparent. I use the path to the image file as the value of the shape-outside property. The content now wraps around the star shape.
trans-unit.target: 举一个简单的例子，我有一个恒星图像，它有一个红色的实心区域和一个完全透明的区域。我将图像文件的路径用作 shape-outside 属性的值。现在，内容将环绕星形。

trans-unit.source: As a two-dimensional layout method, when working with grid layout we always have two axes on which to align our items. We have access to all of the box alignment properties to help us achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种二维布局方法,当使用网格布局时,我们总是有两个轴来对齐我们的项目。我们可以访问所有的方框对齐属性来帮助我们实现这个目标。

trans-unit.source: As a very simple example we can create a “media object”. This is a component with space for an image or other media on one side and content on the other. The image might be displayed on the right or left of the box.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个非常简单的示例，我们可以创建一个“媒体对象”。这是一个组件，在一侧具有用于图像或其他媒体的空间，而在另一侧具有内容的空间。该图像可能显示在框的右侧或左侧。

trans-unit.source: As a very simple example we can take a grid with 3 column tracks and 3 row tracks. This gives us 4 lines in each dimension.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个非常简单的例子,我们可以取一个有3列轨道和3行轨道的网格。这样我们在每个维度上就有4条线。

trans-unit.source: As a way to start thinking about these issues, as you use CSS Grid Layout I would suggest reading Flexbox & the Keyboard Navigation Disconnect from Léonie Watson. Also the video of Léonie’s presentation from ffconf is helpful to understand more about how screen readers work with the visual representation of things in CSS. Adrian Roselli has also posted regarding tab order in various browsers – although this was prior to grid support being fully implemented in Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 作为开始考虑这些问题的一种方式，当您使用CSS网格布局时，建议您阅读LéonieWatson的Flexbox和键盘导航断开连接。此外罗尼的演讲从ffconf视频有助于了解更多关于屏幕阅读器如何与事物在CSS的直观表示工作。Adrian Roselli还发布了有关各种浏览器中选项卡顺序的信息，尽管这是在Firefox中完全实现网格支持之前的。

trans-unit.source: As an additional example, if you use the keywords top left for position, you can make a quarter circle shape in the top left corner of the page. The example below uses generated content to create a quarter circle shape for text to flow around.
trans-unit.target: 再举一个例子，如果您使用关键字 top left 作为位置，则可以在页面的左上角制作一个四分之一圆的形状。下面的示例使用生成的内容创建四分之一圆形状，以使文本四处流动。

trans-unit.source: As an element of the page may be matched by several selectors, and therefore by several rules potentially containing a given property several times, with different values, the CSS standard defines which one has precedence over the other and must be applied: this is called the cascade algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 由于页面的一个元素可能被多个选择器匹配，因此被可能多次包含给定属性且具有不同值的多个规则所匹配，因此CSS标准定义了哪个优先于另一个并且必须应用：这称为级联算法。

trans-unit.source: As column boxes created inside multicol containers are anonymous boxes, there is little we can do to style them. However, we do have a few things that we can do. This guide explains how to change the gap and style rules between columns.
trans-unit.target: 由于在 multicol 容器内创建的列框是匿名框,我们几乎无法对它们进行样式设计。但是,我们有一些事情可以做。本指南介绍了如何改变列间的间隙和样式规则。

trans-unit.source: As defined in the specification, the margins between two block boxes are what creates separation between the elements. We see this with a very simple layout of two paragraphs, to which I have added a border. The default browser stylesheet adds spacing between the paragraphs by way of adding a margin to the top and bottom.
trans-unit.target: 正如规范中所定义的那样,两个方框之间的边框是元素之间的分隔。我们可以通过一个非常简单的两段布局看到这一点,我在其中添加了一个边框。默认的浏览器样式表通过在顶部和底部添加一个边框来增加段落之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: As defined in the specification, there are two kinds of axes: registered and custom:
trans-unit.target: 根据规范中的定义，有两种轴：注册轴和自定义轴：

trans-unit.source: As described in the guide to named lines, we are using the named line to place our item. As we have 12 lines all with the same name we use the name, and then the index of the line. You could also use the line index itself if you prefer and avoid using named lines at all.
trans-unit.target: 如命名行指南中所述，我们正在使用命名行放置项目。因为我们有12行都具有相同的名称，所以我们使用名称，然后使用行的索引。如果愿意，也可以使用行索引本身，而根本不要使用命名行。

trans-unit.source: As expected, the browser substitutes the value of --text-color in place of var(--text-color), but 16px is not a valid property value for color. After substitution, the property doesn’t make any sense. The browser handles this situation in two steps:

trans-unit.source: As for block boxes, there are a few cases where inline boxes are created automatically by the CSS engine. These inline boxes are also anonymous as they cannot be named by selectors; they inherit the value of all inheritable properties, setting it to initial for all others.
trans-unit.target: 至于方块盒，在某些情况下CSS引擎会自动创建内联盒。这些内联框也是匿名的，因为它们不能由选择器命名。它们继承所有可继承属性的值，将所有其他属性的值设置为 initial 。

trans-unit.source: As in this level of the specification an element has to be floated in order to apply <basic-shape> to it; this has the side-effect of creating a simple fallback for many cases. If you do not have Shapes support in the browser, the user will see content flowing around the sides of a rectangular box as before. If they do have Shapes support then the visual display is enhanced.
trans-unit.target: 像在本规范的该级别中一样，必须浮动一个元素才能对其应用 <basic-shape> ；在许多情况下，这样做的副作用是创建简单的后备。如果浏览器中没有Shapes支持，则用户将看到内容像以前一样在矩形框的侧面流动。如果它们确实具有“形状”支持，则视觉显示将得到增强。

trans-unit.source: As it turns out, nobody seems to have used the first option. The second option was taken by Internet Explorer for Windows and Macintosh, and Opera. The third was adopted by Gecko, and by extension all the browsers that embed it.
trans-unit.target: 事实证明,似乎没有人使用第一个选项。第二个选项被Windows和Macintosh的Internet Explorer以及Opera所采用。第三种选择被Gecko采用,并延伸到所有嵌入它的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned above, when an element is floated, it is taken out of the normal flow of the document (though still remaining part of it). It is shifted to the left, or right, until it touches the edge of its containing box, or another floated element.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，当元素浮动时，它会从文档的正常流程中移除（尽管仍然是文档的一部分）。它会向左或向右移动，直到接触其包含框或另一个浮动元素的边缘。

trans-unit.source: As the allowed space increases in size, the repeated images will stretch (leaving no gaps) until there is room (space left >= half of the image width) for another one to be added. When the next image is added, all of the current ones compress to allow room. Example: An image with an original width of 260px, repeated three times, might stretch until each repetition is 300px wide, and then another image will be added. They will then compress to 225px.
trans-unit.target: 随着允许空间的大小增加，重复的图像将拉伸（不留间隙），直到有空间（剩余空间> =图像宽度的一半）可以添加另一幅图像为止。添加下一个图像时，所有当前图像都会压缩以留出空间。示例：原始宽度为260px的图像，重复3次，可能会拉伸直到每次重复的宽度为300px，然后再添加另一幅图像。然后，它们将压缩为225px。

trans-unit.source: As the allowed space increases in size, the repeated images will stretch (leaving no gaps) until there is room for another one to be added. When the next image is added, all of the current ones compress to allow room. Example: An image with an original width of 260px, repeated three times, might stretch until each repetition is 300px wide, and then another image will be added. They will then compress to 225px.
