trans-unit.source: As with any front-end technology choice, the decision to use CSS Grid Layout will come down to the browsers your site visitors are typically using. If they tend to use up-to-date versions of Firefox, Chrome, Opera, and Safari, then it would make sense to start using CSS grids once those browsers update. If your site serves a market sector that is tied to older browsers, however, it may not make sense yet. However, my suggestion is not to make assumptions based on how new specifications have been rolled out in browsers in the past. CSS Grid Layout is very different, in terms of the amount of time it has been in development, and the work of the various browser vendors to ensure that what ships works in the same way for everyone.
trans-unit.target: 与任何前端技术选择一样,使用CSS网格布局的决定将归结为你的网站访问者通常使用的浏览器。如果他们倾向于使用最新版本的Firefox、Chrome、Opera和Safari,那么一旦这些浏览器更新,就开始使用CSS网格是有意义的。然而,如果你的网站服务的市场领域与旧版浏览器挂钩,那可能还没有意义。不过,我的建议是不要根据过去浏览器中新规范的推出情况来做假设。CSS网格布局是非常不同的,从它的开发时间来看,以及各种浏览器供应商的工作,以确保出货的东西对每个人都能以同样的方式工作。

trans-unit.source: As with any gradient, a linear gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element it applies to.
trans-unit.target: 与任何渐变一样，线性渐变没有内在尺寸；即，它没有自然的或优选的尺寸，也没有优选的比例。其具体大小将与其所应用元素的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: As with any gradient, a radial gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element it applies to.
trans-unit.target: 与任何梯度一样，径向梯度也没有内在尺寸。即，它没有自然的或优选的尺寸，也没有优选的比例。其具体大小将与其所应用元素的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: As with any gradient, a repeating linear gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element it applies to.
trans-unit.target: 与任何渐变一样，重复的线性渐变没有内在尺寸；即，它没有自然的或优选的尺寸，也没有优选的比例。其具体大小将与其所应用元素的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: As with any gradient, a repeating radial gradient has no intrinsic dimensions; i.e., it has no natural or preferred size, nor a preferred ratio. Its concrete size will match the size of the element it applies to.
trans-unit.target: 与任何渐变一样，重复的径向渐变没有内在尺寸；即，它没有自然的或优选的尺寸，也没有优选的比例。其具体大小将与其所应用元素的大小匹配。

trans-unit.source: As with any interpolation involving colors, gradients are calculated in the alpha-premultiplied color space. This prevents unexpected shades of gray from appearing when both the color and the opacity are changing. (Be aware that older browsers may not use this behavior when using the transparent keyword.)
trans-unit.target: 与任何涉及颜色的插值一样，在alpha预乘的颜色空间中计算渐变。当颜色和不透明度都改变时，这可以防止出现意外的灰色阴影。（请注意，较早的浏览器在使用transparent关键字时可能不会使用此行为。）

trans-unit.source: As with any shorthand property, any individual value that is not specified is set to its corresponding initial value (possibly overriding values previously set using non-shorthand properties). Though not directly settable by font, the longhands font-stretch, font-size-adjust, and font-kerning are also reset to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 与任何速记属性一样，未指定的任何单个值都将设置为其相应的初始值（可能会覆盖以前使用非速记属性设置的值）。虽然不能直接由 font 设置，但一手 font-stretch ， font-size-adjust 和 font-kerning 也将重置为其初始值。

trans-unit.source: As with linear gradients, all you need to create a radial gradient are two colors.
trans-unit.target: 与线性渐变一样,创建径向渐变所需要的只是两种颜色。

trans-unit.source: As with margin, there are two-value shorthands for padding — padding-inline and padding-block — which allow you to set the padding of the two inline, and two block dimensions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 与margin一样，有两个填充的简写形式— padding-inline 和 padding-block —允许您分别设置两个内联和两个块尺寸的填充。

trans-unit.source: As with other URLs in CSS, the URL may be relative, in which case it is resolved relative to the location of the style sheet containing the @font-face rule. In the case of SVG fonts, the URL points to an element within a document containing SVG font definitions. If the element reference is omitted, a reference to the first defined font is implied. Similarly, font container formats that can contain more than one font load only one of the fonts for a given @font-face rule. Fragment identifiers are used to indicate which font to load. If a container format lacks a defined fragment identifier scheme, a simple 1-based indexing scheme (e.g., "font-collection#1" for the first font, "font-collection#2" for the second font, etc.) is used.
trans-unit.target: 与CSS中的其他URL一样，URL可能是相对的，在这种情况下，它是相对于包含 @font-face 规则的样式表的位置来解析的。对于SVG字体，URL指向包含SVG字体定义的文档中的元素。如果省略元素引用，则暗示对第一个定义的字体的引用。同样，可以包含多个字体的字体容器格式仅会加载给定 @font-face 规则的一种字体。片段标识符用于指示要加载的字体。如果容器格式缺少定义的片段标识符方案，则使用基于1的简单索引方案（例如，第一种字体的“ font-collection＃1”，第二种字体的“ font-collection＃2”等） 。

trans-unit.source: As with other properties in the specification we have some new shorthand properties, which give the ability to set two or four values at once. These do not have a direct mapping to physical equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 与规范中的其他属性一样,我们有一些新的速记属性,可以同时设置两个或四个值。这些属性没有直接映射到物理等价物。

trans-unit.source: As you adjust the parameters that define the color, it gets displayed in all three standard Web CSS formats. In addition, based on the currently-selected color, a palette for HSL and HSV, as well as alpha, is generated. The "eyedropper" style color picker box can be toggled between HSL or HSV format. You can also test colors and how they overlap one another by dragging them into the box at the bottom of the tool and moving them over one another. Adjust their relative Z index values to move them forward and behind one another.
trans-unit.target: 当你调整定义颜色的参数时,它将以所有三种标准的Web CSS格式显示。此外,基于当前选择的颜色,会生成HSL和HSV以及alpha的调色板。eyedropper "风格的颜色选择器框可以在HSL或HSV格式之间切换。您还可以通过将颜色拖入工具底部的框中,并将它们互相移动,来测试颜色以及它们之间的重叠情况。调整它们的相对Z指数值,以使它们彼此向前和向后移动。

trans-unit.source: As you can see from this guide, CSS Grid Layout is just one part of your toolkit. Don’t be afraid to mix it with other methods of doing layout to get the different effects you need.
trans-unit.target: 从本指南可以看到，CSS Grid Layout只是工具包的一部分。不要害怕将其与其他布局方法混合使用以获得所需的不同效果。

trans-unit.source: As you can see here, the Firefox logo (listed first within background-image) is on top, directly above the bubbles graphic, followed by the gradient (listed last) sitting underneath all previous 'images'. Each subsequent sub-property (background-repeat and background-position) applies to the corresponding backgrounds. So the first listed value for background-repeat applies to the first (frontmost) background, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，Firefox徽标（在 background-image 中首先列出）在顶部，气泡图形的正上方，然后是所有先前“图像”下面的渐变（最后列出）。每个后续子属性（ background-repeat 和 background-position ）都适用于相应的背景。因此， background-repeat 的第一个列出的值适用于第一个（最前面的）背景，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: As you can see with the above example, if you create a grid all child items will lay themselves out one into each grid cell. The default flow is to arrange items by row. Grid will lay an item out into each cell of row 1. If you have created additional rows using the grid-template-rows property then grid will continue placing items in these rows. If the grid does not have enough rows in the explicit grid to place all of the items new implicit rows will be created.
trans-unit.target: 从上面的示例中可以看到，如果创建一个网格，则所有子项将自己布置到每个网格单元中。默认流程是按行排列项目。网格将在第1行的每个单元格中放置一个项目。如果使用 grid-template-rows 属性创建了其他行，则网格将继续在这些行中放置项目。如果网格在显式网格中没有足够的行来放置所有项目，则将创建新的隐式行。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, the CSS is actually essentially identical, save the name of the image file.
trans-unit.target: 大家可以看到,其实CSS基本相同,保存图片文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: As you learn and then work with the CSS Grid Layout this tool will give you a better idea of what is happening with your grids visually.
trans-unit.target: 当你学习并使用CSS网格布局时,这个工具会让你更好地了解你的网格在视觉上发生了什么。

trans-unit.source: As you position some items, other items on the grid will continue to be laid out using the auto-placement rules. We will take a proper look at how these work in a later guide but you can see as you work that grid is laying out un-placed items into empty cells of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 当你定位一些项目时,网格上的其他项目将继续使用自动放置规则进行布局。我们将在后面的指南中适当地看看这些规则是如何工作的,但你可以看到,当你工作时,网格正在将未放置的项目布置到网格的空单元中。

trans-unit.source: Assigning outline a value of 0 or none will remove the browser's default focus style. If an element can be interacted with, it must have a visible focus indicator. Provide obvious focus styling if the default focus style is removed.
trans-unit.target: 将 outline 的值指定为 0 或 none 将删除浏览器的默认焦点样式。如果可以与某个元素进行交互，则它必须具有可见的焦点指示器。如果删除了默认焦点样式，则提供明显的焦点样式。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technology cannot parse background images. If the image contains information critical to understanding the page's overall purpose, it is better to describe it semantically in the document.
trans-unit.target: 辅助技术无法解析背景图片。如果图像包含对理解页面整体目的至关重要的信息,最好在文档中对其进行语义描述。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technology cannot parse border images. If the image contains information critical to understanding the page's overall purpose, it is better to describe it semantically in the document.
trans-unit.target: 辅助技术无法解析边框图像。如果图像包含对理解页面整体目的至关重要的信息,最好在文档中对其进行语义描述。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technology such as screen readers cannot parse interactive content that is empty. All interactive content must have an accessible name, which is created by providing a text value for the interactive control's parent element (anchors, buttons, etc.). Accessible names expose the interactive control to the accessibility tree, an API that communicates information useful for assistive technologies.
trans-unit.target: 诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术无法解析空白的交互式内容。所有交互式内容都必须具有可访问的名称，该名称是通过为交互式控件的父元素（锚，按钮等）提供文本值来创建的。可访问的名称将交互式控件暴露给可访问性树，可访问性树是一种可传达对辅助技术有用的信息的API。

trans-unit.source: Assistive technology support is very limited for the speak-as property. Do not rely on it to convey information critical to understanding the page's purpose.
trans-unit.target: 对于口头 speak-as 属性，辅助技术支持非常有限。不要依靠它来传达对理解页面用途至关重要的信息。

trans-unit.target: 相关内容

trans-unit.target: 相关类型

trans-unit.source: Assume that the document is UTF-8
trans-unit.target: 假设文档是UTF-8

trans-unit.source: Assuming that the browser's default font-size is 16px, the words “outer” would be rendered at 16px, but the word “inner” would be rendered at 25.6px. This is because the inner span's font-size is 1.6 em which is relative to its parent's font-size, which is in turn relative to its parent's font-size. This is often called compounding.
trans-unit.target: 假设浏览器的默认 font-size 为16px，则单词“ outer”将以16px呈现，而单词“ inner”将以25.6px呈现。这是因为内部范围的 font-size 为1.6 em，相对于其父级的 font-size ，后者又相对于其父级的 font-size 。这通常称为复利。

trans-unit.target: 星号(*)

trans-unit.source: At least one input mechanism includes a pointing device of limited accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 至少一个输入机构包括一个有限精度的指向装置。

trans-unit.source: At least one input mechanism includes an accurate pointing device.
trans-unit.target: 至少一个输入机构包括一个精确的指向装置。

trans-unit.source: At least one of the components must be present, and they may appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: 至少必须有一个组成部分,它们可以以任何顺序出现。

trans-unit.source: At least two counter symbols must be specified in the symbols descriptor or the counter style is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 必须在 symbols 描述符中指定至少两个计数器符号，否则计数器样式无效。

trans-unit.source: At present only Microsoft Edge supports the unprefixed properties, therefore to use the gap properties in grid layout you should use the grid-row-gap, grid-column-gap and grid-gap versions to ensure full compatibility. You could double up the properties and use both as you would for vendor prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 当前，只有Microsoft Edge支持不带前缀的属性，因此，要在网格布局中使用间隙属性，应使用 grid-row-gap ， grid-column-gap 和 grid-gap 版本以确保完全兼容。您可以将属性加倍，并像对供应商前缀一样使用它们。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of this article I explained that the alignment properties currently contained in the Level 1 flexbox specification are also included in Box Alignment Level 3, which may well extend these properties and values in the future. We have already seen one place where this has happened, with the introduction of the space-evenly value for align-content and justify-content properties.
trans-unit.target: 在本文的开头，我解释了级别1柔盒规范中当前包含的对齐属性也包含在Box Alignment Level 3中，这可能会在将来很好地扩展这些属性和值。我们已经看到了发生这种情况的地方，引入了 align-content 和 justify-content 属性的 space-evenly 值。

trans-unit.source: At the next breakpoint we want to move to a two-column layout. Our header and navigation still span the full grid, so we do not need to specify any positioning for them. The sidebar is starting on the first column line named col-start, spanning 3 lines. It goes after row line 3, as the header and navigation are in the first two row tracks.
trans-unit.target: 在下一个断点处,我们要转为双栏布局。我们的页眉和导航仍然跨越整个网格,所以我们不需要为它们指定任何定位。侧边栏是从第一列行开始的,名为col-start,跨度为3行。它在第3行之后,因为页眉和导航在前两行的轨道上。

trans-unit.source: Atomic inline boxes cannot be split into several lines in an inline formatting context.
trans-unit.target: 原子内嵌框不能在内嵌格式上下文中被分割成几行。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to display a sequence of consecutive ASCII digits (U+0030–U+0039) that has as many or fewer characters than the specified integer, such that it takes up the space of a single character within the vertical line box. If the integer is omitted, it computes to 2. Integers outside the range of 2-4 are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 尝试显示连续的ASCII数字序列（U + 0030–U + 0039），该序列的字符数少于或等于指定的整数，以致于它在垂直线框内占据单个字符的空间。如果省略整数，则计算结果为2。2-4范围以外的整数无效。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to typeset all consecutive characters within the box horizontally, such that they take up the space of a single character within the vertical line of the box.
trans-unit.target: 试图水平排版框内的所有连续字符,使它们占据框内垂直线内单个字符的空间。

trans-unit.source: Authors can set values for the longhand properties: grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns, and grid-template-areas.
trans-unit.target: 作者可以设置长期属性的值： grid-template-rows ， grid-template-columns 和 grid-template-areas 。

trans-unit.source: Authors must use order and the grid-placement properties only for visual, not logical, reordering of content. Style sheets that use these features to perform logical reordering are non-conforming.
trans-unit.target: 作者必须将顺序和网格位置属性仅用于内容的视觉上,而不是逻辑上的重新排序。使用这些特性来执行逻辑重新排序的样式表是不符合要求的。

trans-unit.source: Authors should not expect capitalize to follow language-specific title casing conventions (such as skipping articles in English).
trans-unit.target: 作者不应期望 capitalize 遵循特定于语言的标题大写惯例（例如，跳过英语文章）。

trans-unit.source: Auto-filling grid tracks
trans-unit.target: 自动填充网格轨道

trans-unit.source: Auto-hiding scrollbars are used if the element's content overflows. Auto-hiding scrollbars are displayed during scrolling or shortly after the pointer interacts with the page, and are hidden shortly after scrolling and pointer interaction stops. When they are visible, auto-hiding scrollbars overlap the element's content.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的内容溢出,就会使用自动隐藏滚动条。自动隐藏滚动条会在滚动过程中或指针与页面交互后不久显示,并在滚动和指针交互停止后不久隐藏。当它们可见时,自动隐藏滚动条会与元素的内容重叠。

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement and Writing Modes
trans-unit.target: 自动排版和写作模式

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement by column
trans-unit.target: 按列自动放置

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement can also help you lay out interface items which do have logical order. An example is the definition list in this next example. Definition lists are an interesting challenge to style as they are flat, there is nothing wrapping the groups of dt and dd items. In my example I am allowing auto-placement to place the items, however I have classes that start a dt in column 1, and dd in column 2, this ensure that terms go on one side and definitions on the other - no matter how many of each we have.
trans-unit.target: 自动放置还可以帮助您布置确实具有逻辑顺序的界面项目。下一个示例中的定义列表就是一个示例。定义列表对于样式而言是一个有趣的挑战，因为它们很扁平，没有东西可以包裹 dt 和 dd 项目组。在我的示例中，我允许自动放置项目，但是我有一些类在第1列中以 dt 开头，在第2列中以 dd 开头，这确保了术语在一侧而定义在另一侧-无论有多少我们每个人都有。

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement in CSS Grid Layout
trans-unit.target: 在CSS网格布局中自动放置

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement in grid layout
trans-unit.target: 在网格布局中自动放置

trans-unit.source: Auto-placement is useful whenever you have a collection of items. That could be items that do not have a logical order such as a gallery of photos, or product listing. In that case you might choose to use the dense packing mode to fill in any holes in your grid. In my image gallery example I have some landscape and some portrait images. I have set landscape images – with a class of landscape to span two column tracks. I then use grid-auto-flow: dense to create a densely packed grid.
trans-unit.target: 只要您有一系列项目，自动放置就很有用。可能是没有逻辑顺序的商品，例如照片库或产品清单。在这种情况下，您可以选择使用密集填充模式来填充网格中的任何孔。在我的图片库示例中，我有一些风景和一些肖像图像。我已经设置了风景图像–一类 landscape 横跨两个列轨迹。然后，我使用 grid-auto-flow: dense 创建密集的网格。

trans-unit.source: Background color for combo-boxes. Should be used with the -moz-ComboboxText foreground color. In versions prior to 1.9.2, use -moz-Field instead.
trans-unit.target: 组合框的背景色。应与 -moz-ComboboxText 前景色一起使用。在1.9.2之前的版本中，请改用 -moz-Field 。

trans-unit.source: Background color for dialog boxes. Should be used with the -moz-DialogText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 对话框的背景色。应与 -moz-DialogText 前景色一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Background color for even-numbered rows in a tree. Should be used with the -moz-FieldText foreground color. In Gecko versions prior to 1.9, use -moz-Field. See also -moz-OddTreeRow.
trans-unit.target: 树中偶数行的背景颜色。应与 -moz-FieldText 前景色一起使用。在1.9之前的Gecko版本中，请使用 -moz-Field 。另请参见 -moz-OddTreeRow 。

trans-unit.source: Background color for highlighted item in HTML <select>s. Should be used with the -moz-html-CellHighlightText foreground color. Prior to Gecko 1.9, use -moz-CellHighlight.
trans-unit.target: HTML <select> 中突出显示的项目的背景颜色。应与 -moz-html-CellHighlightText 前景色一起使用。在Gecko 1.9之前，请使用 -moz-CellHighlight 。

trans-unit.source: Background color for hovered menu items. Often similar to Highlight. Should be used with the -moz-MenuHoverText or -moz-MenuBarHoverText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 悬停的菜单项的背景颜色。通常类似于 Highlight 。应与 -moz-MenuHoverText 或 -moz-MenuBarHoverText 前景色一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Background color for odd-numbered rows in a tree. Should be used with the -moz-FieldText foreground color. In Gecko versions prior to 1.9, use -moz-Field. See also -moz-EvenTreeRow.
trans-unit.target: 树中奇数行的背景颜色。应与 -moz-FieldText 前景色一起使用。在1.9之前的Gecko版本中，请使用 -moz-Field 。另请参见 -moz-EvenTreeRow 。

trans-unit.source: Background color for selected item in a tree widget. Should be used with the -moz-CellHighlightText foreground color. See also -moz-html-CellHighlight.
trans-unit.target: 树小部件中所选项目的背景色。应与 -moz-CellHighlightText 前景色一起使用。另请参见 -moz-html-CellHighlight 。

trans-unit.source: Background color for tooltip controls. Should be used with the InfoText foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示控件的背景颜色。应与 InfoText 前景色一起使用。
